PublicRemarks: Welcome to the vibrant Dominion Valley community, where luxury living meets an active lifestyle. This master-planned community by Toll Brothers offers a wealth of amenities, including markets, restaurants, barbers, bars, tennis and basketball courts, indoor and outdoor pools, and miles of scenic walking trails. Nestled on a tranquil street with a backdrop of a championship golf course, this home is a sanctuary of comfort and style. As you enter, you're greeted by an open-concept layout with soaring ceilings and elegant bamboo flooring throughout. The expansive entryway sets the tone for the inviting spaces that follow. The heart of the home is the gourmet kitchen, which seamlessly flows into a sunlit family room and sunroom,  which offer access to a deck with serene views of trees and the golf course. Imagine relaxing in this peaceful setting, where indoor and outdoor living blend effortlessly. On the main floor, you'll find formal living and dining areas, an office space, a convenient laundry room, and a stylish powder room. Upstairs, the spacious master suite is a private retreat, featuring his-and-hers closets and a beautifully updated bathroom with a floating tub and a spa-like shower. Three additional bedrooms share two updated bathrooms, providing ample closet space and comfort for family and guests. The fully finished basement is designed for entertainment and relaxation, with engineered hardwood floors, mounted TVs, comfortable seating, and a dining area. An exercise room (equipment not included) and a wet bar with a mini fridge and sink complete the lower level. Outdoor living is a delight with the composite deck flooring and a natural gas hookup for your BBQ. Just bring your furniture and start enjoying the serene surroundings. The home features a two car garage with ample space to store your tools.  In addition there is builtin in 240V EV charging for Tesla.  This home also includes  stainless steel appliances including washer/drier.

PublicRemarks: This stunning, rarely available garage townhome is in one of Reston’s original clusters surrounding Lake Anne. You’ll have views of the lake from your living room throughout the majority of the year. Access to a shared dock on a quiet inlet with recently upgraded canoe and paddleboard storage is just steps away. You’ll be just a five-minute walk from Lake Anne Plaza where you can visit several restaurants, a brew pub, shops, events, concerts, and a farmers’ market every Saturday. This is a vibrant community with easy access to all the wooded trails, parks, courts, and pools that Reston has to offer. Reston Town Center with its upscale restaurants, shops, metro station, movie theatre, and ice skating rink is just minutes away. The Wiehle Metro Station on the Silver Line and the Dulles Greenway commuter route are just 2 miles away.  A charming stone wall landscaping in front leads to an enclosed blue stone courtyard and a covered patio over the front door. This 4 bedroom 3.5 bath townhome has an abundance of natural light through many floor-to-ceiling windows and sliding glass doors. An open staircase provides a sought-after mid-century vibe. There have been many recent updates including all windows and sliding glass doors; bathrooms; kitchen cabinets, lights, and appliances including smart refrigerator; washer and dryer; water heater; furnace; asphalt roof; bluestone patio; wood deck; refinished hardwood; carpet in basement; fresh paint throughout; home automation switches and Nest thermostat; stone wall in family room, light fixture in dining room, etc. The home has a one-car garage with upgraded heavy-duty storage, one reserved parking space, and plenty of free guest parking. Your dream lifestyle awaits!

ListOfficeName: Bay Property Mgmt Group Northern Virginia, LLC.
AgentRemarks: Please contact Stephanie with Bay Property Management Group at  smerritt@bmgnva.com or call 571-455-5185 with any questions you have about the property. Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable Owner will consider pet(s) on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. PublicRemarks: Welcome to 3163 Harvard Street, a beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home located in the desirable Lake Ridge community. This rental property offers an ideal blend of modern upgrades and comfortable living spaces, making it the perfect place to call home. Key Features: Modern Kitchen: The heart of this home is its new kitchen, featuring sleek countertops, appliances, and ample cabinet space. Whether you’re a culinary enthusiast or enjoy casual meals, this kitchen is designed to meet all your needs. New Flooring Throughout Main Level: The main level showcases brand-new flooring, enhancing the home's modern aesthetic and providing a fresh, clean look that flows seamlessly throughout the living and dining areas. Bedrooms: All three bedrooms are located on the upper level, including a large primary bedroom with generous closet space and sitting area. Each room offers plenty of natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Versatile Lower Level: The fully finished lower level adds significant living space with a versatile bonus room. This area can serve as a home office, guest suite, or recreation room and includes a full bathroom for added convenience. Fenced-In Backyard: Step outside to a fully fenced backyard, perfect for outdoor entertaining, gardening, or simply enjoying some private outdoor space. The backyard offers ample room for pets and play. Prime Location: Situated in a quiet and well-established Lake Ridge neighborhood, this home is conveniently located near schools, shopping centers, restaurants, and parks. Easy access to major commuter routes, including I-95, makes this an ideal location for those working in Northern Virginia or commuting to Washington, D.C. Additional Features: The home also includes central air conditioning, two assigned parking spaces, and a laundry area with washer and dryer. This remodeled rental home at 3163 Harvard Street offers a blend of modern amenities and comfortable living spaces in a prime Lake Ridge location. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this house your home!

AgentRemarks: For quickest response text agent – 571-248-9460 To apply please visit our website - https://www.managementpros.com/rental-application/ More information in the document section of the MLS. Please be sure you are using the correct combo box for entry -full details on showing instructions are sent after a showing has been confirmed through the MLS. NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Discover this beautifully updated 3,200 sqft home nestled in the sought-after Williamsburg neighborhood of Arlington. The spacious and light-filled living areas provide a warm and welcoming atmosphere throughout. The bright kitchen, complete with a cozy breakfast nook, seamlessly flows into a sunny, separate dining room, perfect for entertaining. Step outside to the fenced-in patio, ideal for enjoying a quiet morning or a cup of coffee. Upstairs, the home boasts four generously-sized bedrooms and two full baths, including an updated primary ensuite designed for comfort and relaxation. Parking is a breeze with plenty of space available in the backyard. The location is unbeatable, with close proximity to top-rated schools like Nottingham Elementary, Williamsburg Middle, Yorktown High, and Bishop O’Connell High. Commute effortlessly with the East Falls Church Metro, I-66 entrance just a mile away, and easy access to Metro bus and the Custis Trail for biking, jogging, or walking. Enjoy the convenience of nearby parks, pools (Overlee, Yorktown indoor, and Columbus), as well as pharmacies, grocery stores, shopping, and an array of wonderful restaurants.

AgentRemarks: Welcome to this beautiful luxury End-Unit Townhome with Enhanced side Elevation in the popular community of Robinson Manor community! This is the home you have been waiting for!!! This tastefully styled Tristan model townhome includes all of the fine upgrades needed for modern living. On the exterior, you will notice the beautiful curb appeal with professional landscape. The lower level features a bedroom with a full bathroom and a walk-in closet, coat closet and has access to the spacious two car garage with windows. Oak stairs (all levels) will bring you on the main level, the luxury gourmet kitchen with extended custom backsplash, includes upgraded GE profile stainless steel appliance package, gas-cooktop, range hood, large sink with upscale faucet, quartz countertops, and white cabinets with soft close features, under cabinet lights and solid shelves pantry. The whole main of the home features gorgeous wide plank wood flooring. The home showcases open concept living at its best! A large Trex deck is great for outdoor living and is spacious enough for grilling, dining and lounging. The upper-level hosts three spacious bedrooms with high end carpet provide ample closet space and laundry room with full size washer and dryer. Primary bedroom has Coffered ceiling, crown molding and custom walk-in closet. The owner’s bathroom includes a luxury spacious shower with frameless door, upscale tile to the ceiling as well as luxury height dual sinks. All bathrooms have upscale ceramic tiles on floor and shower walls extending to the ceiling, quartz countertops with undermount square sinks and recessed light with switch over shower. Laundry room features wall cabinets for additional storage or laundry supplies. Recessed lights in all bedrooms. Window treatments showcase light filtering cordless cellular shade with Top Down / Bottom Up functionality. This home is minutes from major interstates, a commuter lot, Dulles International Airport and charming downtown Haymarket which hosts restaurants, grocery and more. A community pool and playground is just around the corner for added convenience. Pictures are two years old. Please remove shoes or use shoe covers! Please close all doors and turn off all lights before leaving.

AgentRemarks: For quickest response text agent – 571-248-9460 To apply please visit our website - https://www.managementpros.com/rental-application/ More information in the document section of the MLS. Please be sure you are using the correct combo box for entry -full details on showing instructions are sent after a showing has been confirmed through the MLS. NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Nestled on 3 sprawling acres, this exquisite home boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and an impressive 5,000 square feet of meticulously finished living space. Step into the grand two-story foyer, where elegant laminate flooring flows seamlessly through the formal dining room, formal living room, cozy library/den, and into a vast family room adorned with a striking masonry fireplace and a wood pellet stove. The open-concept design invites you into a chef’s dream kitchen, complete with granite countertops, rich cherry cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and an inviting sunroom. Abundant natural light pours in through expansive windows and skylights, while French doors from the sunroom lead you to a TREX deck overlooking the serene grounds. A newly added pantry with a prep kitchen adds both convenience and style. Ascend one of two staircases to the upper level, where the luxurious primary suite awaits. This retreat features a generous sitting area, an additional closet, and a spa-inspired bathroom with a soaking tub, oversized walk-in shower, dual vanities, and his-and-hers walk-in closets. Three more spacious bedrooms, each with its own walk-in closet, and a well-appointed full bath complete the second floor. The partially finished basement offers a full bath and walkout access to a stone patio, perfect for relaxing in the hot tub. Ideally located, this home is just a short drive from shopping, dining, I-95, historic landmarks, and county parks, making it a perfect blend of luxury and convenience.

PublicRemarks: This stunningly renovated 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom townhouse with 2 car garage and driveway in the desirable Kirkpatrick Farms neighborhood is available for rent immediately. With 2313 sq ft of modern living space, this home offers comfort, style, and convenience in a fantastic community.  Whole house renovated in 2024. The kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring brand-new cabinets, quartz countertops, a waterfall island with an induction cooktop, double wall ovens, and all stainless-steel appliances. The eat-in kitchen opens to a large, bright living room with a 2-story foyer that lets in plenty of natural light. Engineered hardwood floors on the main level and new carpeting on the bedroom level and stairwells. The owner's suite is a luxurious retreat, complete with a walk-in closet and a spacious bathroom featuring a soaking tub and separate shower. The secondary bedrooms are generously sized, perfect for family or guests. The fully finished lower level includes a versatile den with a fireplace, a walkout to the backyard, a full bathroom, and new LVP flooring. The convenience of washer and dryer hookups on both the bedroom level and the lower level adds to the practicality of this home. All major systems, including the A/C, water heater, garage door and opener, and kitchen appliances, have been updated within the last five years, ensuring reliability and peace of mind. Located in the heart of Aldie, Kirkpatrick Farms offers top-rated schools, walking trails, community tennis courts, a swimming pool, and tot lots, making it an ideal place to call home. First and last month's rent, plus a security deposit equal to one month's rent, due at lease signing. Owner prefers a minimum of 9 months, with flexibility for longer terms. Please note, lease end dates in Fall or Winter are not preferred. Trash is included; tenants are responsible for all other utilities. No pets allowed, non-smoking property. PublicRemarks: Welcome to the peaceful and picturesque community of Bridleridge nestled in Vienna. This beautiful neighborhood, in the coveted Flint Hill ES, Thoreau MS and Madison HS Triangle, is one of the area’s best kept secrets. This 3 level, 6 bedroom, 3.5 bath colonial with a front porch sits on over .5 acres and is the perfect oasis to call home. The home boasts a main floor mother-in-law / au pair suite and new sunroom addition both of which overlook the backyard oasis. The property is an entertainer's delight featuring a pool, hot tub, gazebo, outdoor bar with refrigerator and microwave, basketball court, putting green and lovely landscaping throughout the yard as well as a large freshly sealed driveway and front porch. The interior of the home features a welcoming foyer, bright eat-in kitchen, dining room, living room with new (2023) gas fireplace and a first floor office right off the main foyer and the garage entryway, which can serve as a mudroom. The main floor also includes a new full bath and the laundry room off of the kitchen. The upper level features a spacious primary bedroom with en suite full bathroom as well as four additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. As you make your way to the basement, you'll enjoy a large recreational room with another new (2023) gas fireplace as well as an exercise or other purpose room in addition to storage. This special home also has direct access to the W&OD trail that takes you right into the Town of Vienna for the annual Halloween Parade, Holiday Stroll, Summer Concerts and much more. Other updates include: completely new heating system (2024), main AC (2024), pool pump (2023), roof (2022), family room addition + windows (2021), new windows through rest of the home (2019-2020), in-law / au pair suite including full bath conversion on main level (2019), and so much more! Minutes from Maple Ave, highways, and the Tyson's corridor!

The gourmet kitchen is a cook's dream with beautiful cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and pendant lighting. This opens to a large family room with electric fireplace and hardwood floors. Sunlight abounds with a wall of windows on one side and glass doors opening to a private backyard and beautiful stone patio on the other side.  Large separate dining room with modern lighting, chair rail, crown molding, and shadow boxes.  Fourth bedroom/office on main level with a remodeled half bath. Upstairs features hardwood stairs, accented with white risers, sunlit master bedroom with an extra large walk-in closet. The master bathroom has been completely upgraded with an extra large frameless shower. Two other spacious bedrooms and a fully upgraded second bath as well.  Spend your time outside in the private backyard, grill on the stone patio, perfect for entertaining or relaxing with family.   Please note, this home does not have a garage.

PublicRemarks: This completely renovated dream home is a gem you won't want to overlook, located right behind George Washington's historic land. With six spacious bedrooms and 4.5 modern bathrooms, this stunning property boasts 3,116 square feet of living space. The home has been fully permitted as a brand-new build in 2022, with brand new windows, bathrooms, and a kitchen that has been renovated to perfection. The open-concept kitchen is a highlight of the home, featuring a quartz countertop, large island with waterfall seating area, LVP plank flooring, solid wood tread stair casing, modern cabinets, SMART appliances, an induction oven, and LED lighting. The home also features distinctive woodwork, custom cabinetry, and modern paint finishes throughout. The elegant dining room and library are adorned with modern and elegant finishes, and the spacious primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and large in-suite bathroom with a huge shower and free-standing tub. With four additional bedrooms on the second floor, as well as three additional bathrooms, you'll never have to worry about not having enough room for guests. A washer and dryer on the second floor add convenience to the home, and the panoramic balcony in the main master bedroom offers stunning views. A rare find in the neighborhood, this home also features a bedroom on the first floor with a walk-in closet and full bathroom. Whether you're grilling on the upper deck or relaxing in the lush green backyard, the ambiance is perfect. And with its convenient location just eight miles from DC and Arlington, this home has it all. The landscaping was recently seeded, and driveway finished just two months ago, and the attached garage features a Tesla residential CHARGER wall connector outlet. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a piece of history!

AgentRemarks: AGENT:  LIMIT SERVICE.  Please contact owner for showing and application. One of Travel + Leisure's "Best Cities in the U.S. 2023", Alexandria offers the charm of a small town, Old Town's historic allure, and Del Ray's electric vibe, alongside the buzz of the Nation's capital. With limited inventory and high demand, securing a slice of this coveted neighborhood requires swift action and a strong plan. Split Level SFH on a corner lot in a sought-after community. Newly renovated 5 bedrooms and 3.5 bath with living area of 1902 sf. An open floor plan with modern eat-in kitchen offers new quartz countertops, new cabinets and floors. Living Room and dining room open with a sliding door out to a large deck and a serene gazebo, perfect for relaxation and outdoor entertaining! Recently renovated primary bedroom with walk in closet and ensuite bathroom featuring new floor, vanity and shower. Newly finished hallway bath. Hardwood floor and new luxury vinyl plank flooring. The newly finished walk-out basement offers a spacious recreation room with a fireplace, one full bath and bedroom, and laundry room. Fresh interior and exterior painting. Oversized 2 car garage (New Garage doors) with exit to backyard. A large and wide driveway offers plenty of parking spaces. Spacious Lot 0.36 acre, with fully fenced back yard. With proximity to major highways, several Metro stations & bus routes just minutes from home, it is a commuter's dream location. One year of lease at minimum. One month rent as deposit. Renters are responsible for all utilities. No pets. No smoking inside the house.

PublicRemarks: Welcome Home to 8213 Springfield Village Dr! Discover your dream rental at the end of a serene cul-de-sac, where comfort meets style. This immaculate and move-in-ready residence features 4 spacious bedrooms and 2.5 beautifully updated baths, perfect for families and entertaining guests. As you step inside, be greeted by tasteful updates throughout, including fresh two-tone paint, gorgeous hardwood floors, and luxury vinyl plank flooring that flows seamlessly from room to room. The modern kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, ideal for culinary enthusiasts, while the updated hall bath on the upper floor adds a touch of elegance. Natural light pours into every corner, thanks to newer windows that frame picturesque views of the wooded parkland and mature trees surrounding the home. Enjoy the convenience of an expansive one-car garage with an epoxy floor, providing plenty of space for storage or hobbies. Location, Location, Location! This rental home offers convenient access to major highways including 495, 95, and 395, making your commute a breeze. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to Hidden Pond Park, Burke Lake Park, Lake Accotink Park, and Fort Belvoir. Plus, both Franconia/Springfield METRO and Rolling Wood VRE stations are just a short drive away. Traveling? National Airport is within easy reach! For those looking to relax and enjoy summer days, the West Village Pool is a short walk away (membership costs apply). Additionally, this pet-friendly rental welcomes your furry companions, with a maximum of 2 dogs allowed. Don’t miss out on this exceptional rental opportunity—schedule your showing today and start making memories at 8213 Springfield Village Dr!

The upper level has 3 bedrooms, including an owner's bedroom with a large walk-in closet and private owner's bath.  The lower level offers a rec room with relaxing fireplace, separate laundry room, a fourth bedroom, full bath and a door leading to the peaceful patio and fully-fenced-in backyard. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks:
Incredible townhome in the coveted Moorefield Station community, just minutes to the Silver Line metro stop in Ashburn. This unit is filled with natural light that pours in throughout all three levels. A like-new low maintenance home in a walkable community with sidewalks throughout, and the landscaping is maintained by the association. There are four bedrooms and three-and-one-half bathrooms on three finished levels, as well as a rear-loading two car garage and private driveway. In Moorefield Station, living is easy!

You can enter the home from the ground level through either the front, light-filled foyer, or the garage in the back. There is a bedroom and a full bathroom on this level which makes for a perfect space for guests, a home office, or gym! The home has been freshly painted in modern tones throughout and features wide plank hardwood floors and upgraded crown molding.

The thoughtfully designed main level features an open layout while still accommodating distinctive space for living and dining rooms. The upgraded kitchen boasts expansive granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an oversized center island, as well as a spacious breakfast room with access to the composite deck with a privacy screening.

Three additional bedrooms are on the third floor along with a conveniently located washer and dryer. The primary suite is expansive with a soaring vaulted ceiling, hardwood flooring, a modern ceiling fan, a walk-in closet, and an attached upgraded bathroom with a dual vanity and glass shower. The secondary bedrooms are a nice size as well. The entire home features new carpet and fresh paint throughout.

Moorefield Station is an amenity rich community with a fully equipped gym, a clubhouse with regularly scheduled activities, a swimming pool, playgrounds, sidewalks, parks and trails. Highly sought-after Loudoun County schools and within minutes of restaurants, shops, entertainment and many commuter options!

PublicRemarks: This spacious and updated end-unit townhome is available for rent, offering a blend of elegance and comfort. The main level features French doors leading to a den with a cozy fireplace, a convenient powder room, and a beautifully updated kitchen. The kitchen boasts white slow-close cabinets, high-end stainless steel appliances, and opens to a dining room with greenhouse-style windows that flood the space with natural light. A half flight of stairs up, you'll find a large living room with a wood-burning fireplace and a sliding glass door that leads to a private rear patio, perfect for relaxation or entertaining. The next level is dedicated to the master bedroom, which features cathedral ceilings, large windows, a walk-in closet, and a spacious private bath with two vanities, a tub/shower combo, and a separate shower. On the next level, there are two additional bedrooms, one with a loft space, and just a few steps away, you'll find the second full bathroom and attic storage. This townhome combines modern updates with thoughtful design, making it a perfect place to call home. This home is ideally situated just a few steps from Lake Audubon. Enjoy the nearby Lake Audubon Pool, which is just around the corner. For outdoor enthusiasts, the Twin Branches Nature Trail, Cross County Trail, and W&OD Trail are all within easy reach. Shopping is a breeze with the South Lakes Shopping Center conveniently close by.

AgentRemarks: Welcome home to this gorgeous remodeled Cape Cod in sought after Bailey’s Crossroads! High end renovation just completed - everything is brand new! You will be WOWED the moment you walk through the front portico and into the new gourmet kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, 5 burner gas range, glass backsplash, soft close cabinets, under-cabinet lights, custom crown moldings and skylight for natural light all day. Next to the kitchen is the dining room, which adjoins a living room with its own portico as a second entrance.  The main floor features its own master suite, with a remodeled full bathroom.  There is also a half bath and laundry. Upstairs is a separate master suite featuring another remodeled full bathroom and a bedroom and a brand new mini split.  The first and second levels were recently remodeled with cherry oak hardwood floors and new baseboard and shoe-molding.  Both staircases are new and there are custom built in cabinets near both stairs.  Interior and exterior are freshly painted with designer colors.   The fully finished remodeled walk-out basement has a private entrance and can be used as a separate apartment with its own bedroom, bath, kitchen, and laundry, ideal for in-law suite. It opens to a spacious sunroom in rear featuring 2 bonus rooms that can be used as bedrooms, offices, gym or playrooms. The sunroom has its own new mini-split so you can always be comfortable no matter the temperature outside.   In addition to the two mini-splits, the whole-house high efficiency HVAC system is also new.   New double wide concrete driveway can fit as many as 9 cars, no other house in the neighborhood has a driveway this big!  New 30-year architectural shingle roof, new flashing and gutters/downspouts with leaf guard.  Storage shed in back has new paint and roof. This home is the perfect for indoor/outdoor living with front AND side porticos, along with stairs from the kitchen leading to a paver patio ready for BBQs. The professionally landscaped and fenced yard has a variety of perennial flowers that bloom every spring, an Apple tree, and a custom swing. No HOA! Situated on a large corner lot, this charming house is just steps away from Dowden Terrace Park, with walking trail, baseball field, tennis court and playground; a few blocks from Chambliss Park; and less than a mile to Trader Joes, Target, Best Buy, and many other shops and restaurants; 4 minutes to I-395; 12 minutes to DC; 7 minutes to Old Town Alexandria, just blocks away from Arlington.  This house is perfect for everyone! Come see it today before it’s gone!

This 3-bedroom, 3 full bath, and 1 half bath townhome is a lovely interior until. It boasts a beautiful kitchen and an impressive master bedroom with just about 2120 square feet of living space over three levels. The upper level has hardwood floors throughout and includes a spacious sun-filled living room, half bath, large dining room, and luxury eat-in kitchen with breakfast bar and granite countertops. 3rd floor has 2 generous bedrooms, and a full bath as well as the impressive master bedroom which includes a large walk-in closet and master bath featuring double vanity, soaking tub and separate standing shower. On the lower level, you're greeted by a large foyer just off a entry level includes a versatile study/den or bedroom ensuite with a full bath. The lower level also features garage access where you'll have a large 2-car garage and 2-car driveway. The home is well maintained. The home is located near a Park and Ride lot and a Soccer Field. Community amenities include a pool, clubhouse, playgrounds, and walking trails. East Gate Community is located close to shopping, dining, and everyday needs at East Gate Marketplace, Dulles Landing, and South Riding Market Square. East Gate Marketplace has Harris Teeter, Dulles Landing has a Walmart Supermart, and South Riding Market Square has Home Depot. It’s also close to Chantilly Crossing Lane where Costco, Target, Office Depot, and other stores are located. Also close to Lotte Supermarket and Lowes. Wineries and breweries along Route 50 and 15 corridors - within 25 minutes. Just 15 minutes to Dulles International Airport. If you're ready for your next townhome in an amenity-filled community this location can't be beat.

PublicRemarks: Stunning New Build in Premier Community Be the first to experience luxury living in this brand-new, modern home, showcasing a striking brick front, rooftop terrace, and a rear deck. This expansive residence features four spacious bedrooms, four full baths, and one half bath, all accentuated by soaring nine-foot ceilings that add a grand feel throughout. Equipped with dual-zone heating and cooling, this home ensures comfort in every season. The heart of the home is the gourmet chef’s kitchen, boasting upgraded luxury quartz countertops, a large island, and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. Premium fixtures and luxury vinyl plank flooring further elevate the space. The ground level offers convenient access, including a versatile office or bedroom, a half bath, and a two-car garage. The second floor is designed for entertainment and relaxation, featuring a spacious dining room, an expansive living room with an optional extension and deck access, and a well-appointed designer kitchen with an oversized island. A powder room is also included on this level for convenience. The third level houses two generously sized bedrooms, each with its own attached bathroom. The primary suite stands out with a luxury spa bath complete with ceramic tiles and a dual vanity. The fourth level adds another bedroom, a full bath, a spacious loft, and a stunning rooftop terrace. This home is ideally located within walking distance of Brambleton Town Center, offering restaurants, a movie theater, a library, and shops. It’s also close to golf courses, wineries, walking trails, farmers markets, and more, making it a perfect blend of modern living and convenience.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this chic updated townhome in the Windy Hill Community of Alexandria. You'll love this 4-level, 3 bed, 2.5 bath with loft, garage, and two outdoor spaces. This property is inside the Beltway, with great access to major roads and only .5mi from the bus.  This home is modern, updated and in beautiful condition! This home is made for entertaining with an open floor plan on the main level that's perfect for parties that spill out onto a fabulous deck! It has a gourmet Kitchen has granite counters with 42 inch wood cabinets, LG stainless appliances, large island and breakfast nook.  There's also a half-bath on the main. The main bedroom suite is on its own floor with double closets and huge en-suite spa-like bath. The top floor features a bedroom and loft, also with its own bathroom, so the home feels like it actually has two main suites. The loft is a wonderful flex space for home office, reading, yoga, art studio or whatever you want. The lower level features a garage and separate bedroom space with a closet, laundry, gas fireplace and access to the lovely fenced yard and patio. This community is close to major commuter routes of I-395 and I-495, as well as Metro Bus express routes to the Pentagon, avails to the Blue & Yellow Lines of the Metro Transit Line; and is 7 miles to Washington DC, 8 miles to Mount Vernon, 9 miles to the Pentagon & Crystal City, 10 miles to Reagan National Airport, and 17 miles to Fort Belvoir. The property is very convenient to schools, shopping, and restaurants, including Springfield Town Center, as well as Old Town Alexandria. You'll love it here! Updates and Upgrades to the home include: NEW Water Heater in 2021, NEW Microwave/Convection  Oven and Air Fryer - 2021, Samsung Washer and Dryer (WiFi Enabled) TV Painted Cabinets and New Backsplash in Kitchen 2021, Millwork with custom paint and wallpaper in various rooms of the home 2021. Mount in the Living Rm and Drapes and Blinds Convey. Ask you agent for the link to apply!

Tenants who do not upload their own renters' insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days before move-in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters' insurance program. PublicRemarks: Welcome Home! Nestled in the serene cul-de-sac of Arbor Glen, this charming split-foyer offers a blend of comfort and style. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and an attached garage with extra workspace, this home is perfect for modern living. The main level greets you with new laminate wood floors, a bright and airy ambiance, and a kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and a convenient island that flows into the formal dining and living room. Step out from the dining room onto a private deck overlooking mature trees—ideal for barbecues or enjoying a morning coffee. The primary bedroom, positioned at the back for extra privacy, features a ceiling fan, dual closets, and an ensuite bath. Downstairs, a generous family/game room with sliding doors to the side exterior awaits, along with a full bath, utility/laundry room, and garage access. Conveniently located near the Marine Corps base, shops, restaurants, and with quick interstate access, this home combines tranquility and convenience. Don’t miss your chance to make it yours!

PublicRemarks: Discover your perfect home in Old Creek Estates! This exquisite 5-bedroom, 3-bath residence, ideally located across from Olde Creek Elementary and near Frost Middle School and Woodson High School, seamlessly blends elegance with convenience. The chef’s kitchen features 42'' cherry cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar. The expansive dining area fills with natural light and opens to a Trex deck and a level, fully fenced backyard.  The main level boasts a spacious primary bedroom with an en-suite bath and a walk-in closet, along with three additional bedrooms and a full bath. The inviting living room, complete with a cozy wood-burning fireplace, and the home’s hardwood floors upstairs and luxury vinyl downstairs add to its charm. In addition, a remodeled bathroom downstairs complements a versatile bedroom that’s perfect for guests or a home office. AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

AgentRemarks: Agents, please direct your clients to https://wjdpm.com/homes-for-rent/ where they must complete the required WJD Management Rental Application. Sorry, only the WJD application can be accepted. In addition, they must pay both the processing fee ($60 per party to the lease) and the referenced security deposit electronically from our website. Their application cannot be processed until all required funds have been received by our office. If their application is declined, their security deposit will be refunded by Paylease within 5 - 7 business days. Lease must be 12 months minimum. Rather, please obtain the occupant’s contact information from the listing. Finally, for important information about this listing please select the blue “Realtors” tab on our home page. AgentRemarks: Apply using Rent Spree $40/adult: https://apply.link/3Maxjho  Welcome home to this beautiful 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home in Stafford. Built in 2022, this home has upgrades galore, is in a perfect location, and offers the convenience of a low-maintenance lifestyle (HOA covers trash, internet, lawn maintenance).  This home offers the perfect blend of style, functionality, and comfort. With 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, this immaculate residence is designed to impress even the most discerning buyers. From the moment you enter, you'll be greeted by a sense of sophistication, with sleek finishes and an open-concept layout that effortlessly flows from room to room. The spacious living areas provide an ideal setting for both relaxation and entertainment. Whip up culinary masterpieces in the gourmet kitchen, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, stylish cabinetry, and a generous island that serves as the heart of the home. Adjacent to the kitchen, a cozy dining area offers the perfect space for enjoying meals with family and friends. One of the many advantages of this remarkable property is its low-maintenance lifestyle. The HOA covers lawn maintenance, trash removal, and internet services, allowing you to enjoy your free time without the hassle of these routine tasks. Conveniently located in North Stafford, this home offers easy access to a variety of amenities, including shopping centers, dining options, and recreational facilities. Commuting is a breeze with major highways just moments away, connecting you to neighboring cities and employment centers. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to own a nearly brand new, upgraded townhouse in North Stafford. Schedule your private showing today and prepare to fall in love with this exceptional home that effortlessly combines modern living, exquisite finishes, and a location that is second to none.

PublicRemarks: Tucked away in Brambleton HOA, this stylish townhome boasts 1 office room in the main level, 3 bedrooms  in the upper level and 3.5 bathrooms, complete with a whole-house humidifier. Its prime location near a child splash pool and within walking distance to a play area makes it an ideal choice for families.  The home is meticulously maintained and features a modern kitchen equipped with KitchenAid appliances and a newly replaced roof in 2023. The basement offers an inviting space with a spacious recreation area perfect for entertaining or creating a home theater experience. A practical full bathroom on this level adds convenience for new owners. Additional highlights include custom storage area adjacent to the garage, complete with a lockable door, ideal for storing extra items beneath the unused oak stairs at the basement level. Enjoy the convenience of a two-car garage equipped with a Tesla EV charger. The deck provides a serene spot to unwind, offering views of the lush lawn and vegetable garden. This home embodies a lifestyle of elegance, comfort, and modern convenience, ensuring every aspect of living is met with style and functionality. Brambleton's neighborhood parks are abundant and connected by over 18 miles of paved trails, providing well-designed spaces for play, exercise, and relaxation. Brambleton HOA fee includes Verizon FIOS TV, Verizon FIOS Internet and other common amenities. From playgrounds and sports courts to open green areas, these parks are perfect for leisure activities, socializing with neighbors, and enjoying the natural beauty of Brambleton. This home is close to major routes 50, 606, 267 and 28.

PublicRemarks: Move-In Ready! This cozy 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath townhouse is nestled on a private, quiet lot that backs to a serene wooded area. With a premium location, you can easily walk to Wegmans and are just minutes away from the shops and restaurants at Fairfax Corner and Fair Oaks Mall. The home features a brand-new roof and new flooring on both levels, and it has been freshly painted throughout. The main level offers two generously sized closets, a pantry, and an oversized powder room. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: RARELY AVAILABLE FULLY FURNISHED (OPTIONAL) HOME LOCATED IN SOUGHT-AFTER VIRGINIA RUN. LAWN SERVICE INCLUDED IN RENT. CONTACT LISTING AGENT FOR NON-FURNISHED OR HYBRID FURNISHED OPTIONS. Offering over 4,400 square feet of refined living space, 4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, a 2-car garage, a walk-out lower level, and an expansive composite deck, all sited on a stunningly landscaped 1/3-acre lot. As you step inside, you're greeted by a grand two-story foyer. The bright living room, complete with a cozy fireplace, is perfect for relaxing. There is also a spacious dining room, ideal for hosting formal dinners. The gourmet kitchen, the heart of the home, features plenty of cabinets and counter space, a large center island, and high-end stainless steel appliances. Enjoy your morning coffee in the sun-filled breakfast area. The two-story family room boasts a vaulted ceiling, skylights, and a fireplace, making it an inviting space for relaxation. The main level also includes a study with built-ins, a sunroom with vaulted ceilings and triple atrium doors to the deck, and a laundry/mudroom with a utility sink and Kenmore Elite washer and dryer. Upstairs, the luxurious owner's suite features a vaulted ceiling, a walk-in closet, a sitting room with a fireplace, and a remodeled ensuite bathroom with heated tile floors, a freestanding tub, an oversized shower, a dual vanity, and skylights. Two additional bedrooms share a renovated hall bathroom, and there is another bedroom with a private ensuite bath. The walkout basement offers a spacious recreation room with a wet bar, a fourth fireplace, a full bathroom, and tons of storage. Outside, the expansive composite deck overlooks a beautifully landscaped, fenced backyard with a 9-zone irrigation system and a variety of mature trees and shrubs. Located in the sought-after Virginia Run community, this home provides access to amenities like basketball courts, tennis and pickleball courts, tot lots, a pool, and miles of trails, with convenient access to commuter routes, shopping, dining, and parks. This property is the perfect blend of luxury and convenience!

Their application cannot be processed until all required funds have been received by our office. If their application is declined, their security deposit will be refunded by Paylease within 5 - 7 business days. Lease must be 12 months minimum. There is a $250 Pet Processing Fee and a $15/month Pet Administration Fee for tenants with a pet, both of which will be collected on the lease commencement date. For tenants with more than one pet, please contact our office prior to submitting an application. If this home is occupied, DO NOT USE SHOWING TIME TO SCHEDULE ACCESS!! Rather, please obtain the occupant’s contact information from the listing. Finally, for important information about this listing please select the blue “Realtors” tab on our home page. Thank you. *** This home is tenant occupied. Please contact tenant before showing, do not contact listing agent. If unable to speak to tenant, leave a message stating what time you will be there. PublicRemarks: Large, nearly new Potomac Shores luxury townhouse is available for rent with a mid to end of October move in!  2300 sq ft of living space on 4 levels with 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms and a two car garage.  Amazing location in Potomac Shores.  This is a Pulte 4 level townhome with a gorgeous gourmet kitchen and balcony off of the main living area and a sun deck patio on the 4th level.  It is in immaculate condition.  The entry level has a nice covered front porch, and the front door opens into a bonus room/rec room/flex space.  To the rear is a door that opens into the two car garage.  All staircases are hardwood stairs up to the main living area.  The main living area is open concept with a living room, kitchen, and dining area. The Gourmet kitchen has a huge island for cooking and entertaining, stainless appliances, a wall oven, built in microwave, refrigerator, gas six burner cook top, tons of cabinetry, quartz counter tops, and a large pantry.  The main living area has a half bath off the staircase.  Upstairs the third floor has the primary bedroom suite, the laundry room, and the two secondary bedrooms with a hall bathroom. The primary bedroom has a large walk-in closet, bathroom has a soaking tub, large shower, and double sink vanities with upgraded tile and cabinetry.  Both bathrooms have upgraded tile and finishes.  The laundry hook up is on this bedroom level.  Up the stairs to the 4th floor is a bonus room or 4th bedroom that has the outdoor patio sundeck.  The community has plenty of open street parking. The home is available for rent 10/16/24 or thereafter.  The rent includes the HOA fee and use of the amazing amenities that Potomac Shores has to offer.  The rent includes internet, trash removal, snow removal, outdoor pools, clubhouse, gym, indoor pool, playgrounds, sports fields, waterfront dock, trails, and golf memberships are available.  Just a short distance from your front door, the soon-to-be-built VRE train station will let you catch the train to work for a stress-free direct connection to Alexandria and Washington, DC.  Landlord requires the following; no smoking, no pets, income to be at least three times the monthly rent and credit scores of 620 or higher per applicant.  Every adult 18 years and older must complete an application if they will be living in the home.  Please apply via rent spree application link.  There will be credit check, criminal background check,  job verification and rental history check as well as proof of income, assets, and debts.  The home is owner occupied and all showing appointments need to be approved prior to taking entry to the home.  Owner works from home and needs 1-2 hours notice for showings.  Please contact listing agent for showings or schedule online and wait for approval.  Owner prefers a 3 year lease or a 1-2 year lease with the option to renew.  No smoking and no pets.

PublicRemarks: Discover refined living in this lovely 4-bedroom, 4.5-bathroom brick Colonial home, nestled in the renowned Willow Ponds community. The property welcomes you with a spacious front driveway leading to a convenient 2-car attached garage. Inside, enjoy the classic charm of hardwood floors, crown moldings, and tall windows that bathe the home in natural light. The inviting living area is perfect for hosting, while the formal dining room, highlighted by elegant wainscoting and a bay window, sets the stage for memorable gatherings. The updated gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring quartz countertops, a central island, stainless steel appliances, a double oven, subway tile backsplash, a cozy breakfast area, and a butler’s pantry. Adjacent to the kitchen, the family room offers a warm fireplace and seamless access to the balcony. Retreat to the luxurious primary suite, complete with a sitting room, vaulted ceilings, a fireplace, a spacious walk-in closet, and a spa-like bathroom with a soaking tub, stall shower, and double vanity. Additional bedrooms include a guest room with a double closet and a shared Jack and Jill bathroom. The fully finished lower level is an entertainer’s dream, featuring a recreation room, den, kitchenette, and wet bar. Outside, the extensive yard, deck, patio, playground, and firepit create the perfect setting for outdoor fun and relaxation.

AgentRemarks: This immaculate townhome was built in 2023, and the builder used it for its Model.  Imagine how great it would be to live in a home where no one else has lived before. The main level includes a chef's kitchen with GE stainless appliances, a farmhouse sink, an oversized island with white shaker-style cabinets, and stunning quartz countertops.  Unique features include the Sky Lanai off the dining room, which consists of an exterior stone gas fireplace.  Two guest bedrooms on the 3rd floor share a full bath easily accessible from the hallway, and the Owner’s bedroom offers a calm retreat with a spa shower.  The 4th floor offers an open loft with a full bath and balcony. Carlin Place is located just steps from parks, shopping, dining, public transportation, and more, truly making it a community of convenience.

AgentRemarks: For quickest response text agent – 571-248-9460 To apply please visit our website - https://www.managementpros.com/rental-application/ More information in the document section of the MLS. Please be sure you are using the correct combo box for entry -full details on showing instructions are sent after a showing has been confirmed through the MLS. NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Extremely rare 4-level Clarendon—over 1,800 sq feet in total—renovated top to bottom and move-in ready! Missed the summer rental market? Then this one’s for you! Gorgeous hardwood floors and bright recessed lighting welcome you on the main level. The gourmet “eat-in” combination kitchen/dining room features large center island, stone countertops, subway tile backsplash, sleek black appliances, and custom built-in storage benches. Head upstairs to find two comfortable bedrooms plus a beautifully renovated full bathroom. A second set of stairs will take you to the top floor—an expansive primary bedroom with vaulted ceilings, rustic exposed beams, generous closet and unfinished storage space. The lower level features a large rec room with custom built-ins and window seats. Through the rec room, you will find a versatile bonus room, second full bath, and in-unit laundry. Directly off the kitchen, you will find a fully fenced backyard with inviting flagstone patio. From the back gate, you have direct access to the playground. Unit comes with one assigned parking space (316). Amenities galore! Tot lots, tennis courts, basketball courts, outdoor swimming pool. Incredible location: Approximately 2.4 miles to Metro with direct express bus service steps outside front door. Close proximity to Shirlington Village and Bradlee Shopping Center. Direct access to I-395. Easy access to bike path that connects to Four Mile Run and WO&D trail. Dog friendly property!! Owners will allow up to 2 dogs with refundable pet deposit ($500 per dog). PublicRemarks: Welcome to this beautiful house suited on a peaceful cul-de-sac, 4 bedrooms 2 full bathrooms all in one level! Step inside and discover a spacious family room boasting a thoughtfully designed addition, perfect for relaxed gatherings and everyday enjoyment. A separate living room adjacent to the kitchen provides additional space for entertaining, while a deck and screened in sunroom off the kitchen offers a tranquil outdoor retreat. The primary bedroom is generously sized and features an upgraded ensuite bathroom. For added ease, enjoy a separate laundry area and a convenient walk-in pantry, streamlining daily tasks. The kitchen, complete with ample cabinet space and a cozy eating area, is a delightful spot for meals and mingling. Fully fenced backyard beckons for outdoor activities and relaxation, while a screened-in porch and deck offer versatile space. This home boasts several recent upgrades including a dishwasher and stove in 2023, a dryer in 2024, A/C in 2022. Conveniently located near shopping centers, major roads, Dulles Town Center, and more. Pets allowed case by case. Furnitures stay in the house. Shed condition stay as is. Online virtual tour available.

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept one dog that is at least 1-year old up to 40 lbs. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.-----------------------Tenants are responsible to paying all condo association move fees prior to lease commencement.

Downstairs, the high ceilings and abundant natural light from the sliding doors create an inviting space perfect for entertaining. Another wood-burning fireplace enhances the ambiance of this lower level, which includes a full bath, a bedroom, a bonus room, a laundry/mud room with new (2024) washer and dryer and a large utility room with ample storage. The expansive backyard is ideal for relaxing and playing. This home offers incredible space and storage, combining comfort with charm in a truly remarkable setting. PublicRemarks: Stunning Townhome with Three Fully Finished Levels, Ready for New Tenants! Welcome to this beautifully maintained townhome, where every detail is designed for comfort and style. The main level features a bright, sun-filled living room with elegant crown molding, fresh paint, and luxurious vinyl plank flooring throughout. The open-concept kitchen boasts abundant cabinetry, gas cooking, and an extended sunroom that opens onto a spacious deck—perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, the master suite is a serene retreat, complete with brand-new carpet, a cozy sitting area, a walk-in closet, and an attached master bathroom featuring a double vanity and standing shower. AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this remarkable three-story 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom townhome in the highly sought-after Avonlea neighborhood!  Built in 2014 better than model home and in pristine condition, this 3,540 square foot beauty warmly welcomes you with a two story foyer and an open floorplan that boasts spacious and bright living areas all throughout!  The main level features gleaming high end hardwood floors and recessed lighting all leading you into the expansive family room, cozy dining room, casual breakfast nook and gourmet kitchen with an island.  The kitchen, worthy of even Martha Stewart's cooking, features upgraded Quartz countertops, upgraded 42" cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a butlers pantry perfect for your entertainment needs!  Further entertain your family and guests by enjoying wine and peaceful views on your private balcony.  The upper level features three spacious bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and a laundry room .  The massive master bedroom includes two huge walk-in closets, a spacious seating area and a private en-suite master bathroom that just wows!  The master bathroom includes an oversized and luxuary Jakuzi, dual granite countertop vanities, glass enclosed shower with ceramic tile and seating.  The lower level features a fully finished and extensive recreation area with lots of natural light, although a home theatre or game room can fit perfectly as well in this space!  The garage fits two cars plus additional space for storage. Fantastic location! Commuters paradise! Minutes to major routes (Route 50 & 28),  South Riding Market Square and other major shopping centers and restaurants.  The Avonlea community is an amenity rich neighborhood perfect for children and families!  The community offers a scenic pond accented with a fountain, an impressive swimming pool, walking trails, a fitness facility, clubhouse, basketball courts, tennis courts, 2 tot lots and more!  The Dulles South Recreation & Community Center is walking distance! Perfect for family activities and fun!  This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a move-in-ready home in an amazing neighborhood and location- just perfect for you and your family!  Welcome home!

Spacious lower level recreation room with side entrance. Finished lower-level recreation room with dedicated side entrance and full bathroom. Expansive composite deck overlooks fully fenced-in backyard. Painted throughout in modern, neutral wall color. Ideally sited on a level 1/4 acre lot. Fully fenced-in rear. Newer composite deck is perfect for enjoying fall evenings. Approximately one mile from EFC Metro + a short distance to the ART Bus. Convenient to shopping and restaurants. Easy access to Rt 66. Walk to parks! North Arlington schools. Yorktown High School pyramid. Pets considered on a case by case basis (no cats). Yard maintenance is included in rent. No short term lease. No more than 2 incomes to qualify.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 42119 Barrymore Place, a stunning single-family home located in the sought-after community of Marbury Estates. This beautiful residence offers a perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and modern convenience. Boasting over 5,200 square feet of living space, this home features 6 spacious bedrooms, 6.5 bathrooms, and an attached three car garage. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by a grand foyer with high ceilings and abundant natural light that fills the open-concept living areas.  With having the natural light,solar panels, and smart thermostats, you will never have to worry about the electric bill.  The main level showcases gleaming hardwood floors, a formal dining room, a bedroom and 1 full bathroom and1  half bathroom and a cozy family room with a fireplace—ideal for entertaining guests or enjoying cozy nights. In addition, on the main level is a conservatory room which can be used for a home office, rec room, exercise room or another bedroom.  The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, complete with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a large center island, and plenty of cabinetry.  The upper level offers a luxurious master suite with a walk-in closet and a spa-like en-suite bathroom featuring a soaking tub, dual vanities, and a separate shower. Four additional bedrooms, four full bathrooms, and a convenient laundry room to complete this level.  The outdoor area is equally impressive, with a spacious deck and a private backyard—perfect for relaxing or hosting outdoor gatherings. Located in a peaceful neighborhood, this home offers easy access to top-rated schools, shopping, dining, and major commuter routes. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and convenience at 42119 Barrymore Place. Don't miss the opportunity to make this your dream home!
