PublicRemarks: Welcome to this stunning two-level condo, where modern living meets comfort and style. This beautifully updated home features 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms, offering the perfect blend of convenience and elegance. Step inside to discover a sun-filled living space that radiates warmth and charm. The updated kitchen is a chef's dream, complete with sleek countertops, stainless steel appliances, and ample cabinetry. Whether you're preparing a quick meal or entertaining guests, this kitchen is designed to impress. Upstairs, you’ll find two spacious bedrooms with plenty of natural light and generous closet space. The primary bathroom is tastefully designed with modern fixtures, while the additional half bath on the main level adds extra convenience. Enjoy the ease of in-unit laundry and the added benefit of extra storage space, perfect for keeping your home organized and clutter-free. Step out onto your private balcony to soak in the fresh air and enjoy peaceful moments outdoors. Located in a highly desirable community, this condo offers access to premium amenities, including parking and a sparkling pool—perfect for those warm summer days. This condo is a true gem with its prime location, updated features, and welcoming atmosphere. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this vibrant and stylish home your own!

AgentRemarks: Exquisite End-Unit Townhome in Oakton, Virginia Discover luxury and privacy in this stately, all-brick end-unit townhome, ideally situated in the heart of Oakton. This expansive residence offers 3 bedrooms and 3.5 baths, with thoughtful updates and elegant finishes throughout. The main level features stunning hardwood floors and an open concept living space, perfect for entertaining. You’ll be amazed at the expense and care the owners have put into the home with its large wooden plantation shutters that grace all the newly installed windows on the main and upper levels. The beautifully appointed kitchen boasts espresso cabinetry, granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances, seamlessly blending style and functionality. Directly off the kitchen you will find yet another large living area with gas fireplace that could be used as a formal dining room or family rec area large enough for a comfy sectional. Step outside onto the newly stained, large deck—an inviting space for alfresco dining and sheer relaxation. Retreat to the serene owner’s suite, complete with a spacious walk-in closet, vaulted ceiling and an attached spa-like bath featuring a soaking tub, separate shower, and a brand-new double bowl vanity. The additional upstairs bedrooms provide flexibility, with one perfectly suited as a home office, featuring built-in bookshelves for all your storage needs and business needs.  The 3rd bedroom offers space big enough for a king bed, dresser and nightstands.  The lower level offers a cozy but very spacious space for unwinding, with LVP flooring, a 2nd gas fireplace, and a TV and speaker sound system that conveys with the rental. This room could also be used as a very large 4th bedroom perfect for the older kids or utilized as a guest/in-law suite complete with its own outside entrance, full bath and deluxe stainless-steel washer and dryer. From here, access the two-car garage with gleaming epoxy-coated floors and extra storage space for your convenience. Step outside to the beautifully landscaped, fully fenced backyard with a stone paver patio—an ideal spot for outdoor gatherings. Location is everything, and this townhome delivers. Enjoy easy access to all major routes, including Rt. 66, and just a 7-minute drive to the Vienna Metro, putting the best of Northern Virginia and D.C. at your fingertips. With community tennis courts right outside your back door and walking distance to a variety of restaurants and shopping, this home offers the perfect blend of luxury and convenience. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to reside in a premier property in one of Oakton’s most desirable locations!  Lease terms: Min of 12 months max 36 months. Pets: Dogs only, 2 max, 40 lb max weight. $500 for 1 dog, $750 for 2. Tenant responsible for all utilities, weeding and mulching exterior perimeter and inside rear fenced-in area.  Available immediately.  Use RentSpree link to submit an application.  Anyone over 18 residing in home must submit an application.  Maximum 2 person income to qualify for monthly rent.

AgentRemarks: Hello Agents, this model is without a Washer and Dryer. There is laundry area in the same building. There are "some" 3BR 2BA with W/D ask about those when you call the leasing office. Here's what you need to do to secure a unit for your client: #1. Call the LEASING office at 703-560-5902 and ask about the availability. Don't call the listing agent, he won't be able to help you with todays availability. #2. If there are units available, you can bring or send your client to see them. Just make sure your name is registered as the referral source when they visit. #3. If your client decides to rent, just contact Eddie Edwards and he will take care of everything. He will gather all the information and process the paperwork. You don't have to do anything! #4. That's it! There is no paperwork on your part at all. No applications, no leases, nothing. Everything is done by the community and it's super easy and you won't be competing with other applications! You should also know that there are 2 types of elevations for each model: a Classic and a newly Remodeled.  This is the "Classic" price. They have different features and amenities, so you can choose what suits your client best. The newly remodeled 3BR's have W/D but priced slightly higher. Don't miss this opportunity to find a perfect home for your client. Call the leasing office today and get started!
PublicRemarks: Looking for better times ahead? Look no further. Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station offers exceptional, spacious one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes complete with a private balcony or patio. The newly renovated apartments feature custom kitchen cabinets, wood-style plank tile flooring, and stainless-steel appliances. Each apartment is wired for high-speed fiber optic internet access so you can stream your favorite shows and chill or work/learn, all from the comfort of your home. Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station Apartments is only steps away from the Metro Station (Dunn Loring/Merrifield). You will be minutes away from the Mosaic District featuring numerous shops, chic yet casual dining, and award-winning entertainment, including the Angelika Film Center. Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station Apartments is also within the top-rated Fairfax County School District with convenient on-site school bus pick up and drop off. As a resident of this community, you'll enjoy an on-site, well-equipped Fitness Center, two tennis courts, a sparkling swimming pool, sand volleyball court, as well as a full basketball court. Picnic in our Pine Grove or play a round of Chess in our outdoor Games Commons. Our thirty-five (35) acres of lush, beautifully landscaped grounds give you the space you desire without sacrificing the comforts and accessibility of metropolitan living. Call us to schedule a tour of our oversized apartments, ideal for Work From Home.

PublicRemarks: Nestled in serene and lush green scenery and surrounded by 10 acres of usable land with 5 bed 3.5 bath three level colonial home. When you rent this home you are renting 10 acres of land with it  overlooking pastures, scenic views and hills offers so many possibilities for tenants. The property is located in close proximity to Leesburg, Dulles Airport, Aldie, Middleburg,, Haymarket, Chantilly, Rt. 50, and 15 and many commuter roads. Rent this charming brick-front home and be greeted by a classic layout, featuring a welcoming front hallway leading to a formal dining room and spacious living room. The main level boasts newer hardwood floors that guide you to a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, pantry, desk station, and easy access to the rear yard with tiered composite decking and retractable awning – ideal for enjoying outdoor views with manageable sunrise and sunset. Adjacent to the kitchen is a convenient mudroom with storage and access to the 2-car garage. The family room is thoughtfully positioned to offer ample natural light and stunning views, with a cozy brick fireplace, wood-burning stove, and beautiful wood mantel. A half bath completes this level. Ascend the hardwood staircase to the upper level, where hardwood floors continue throughout the hallway and bedrooms. The primary bedroom features a walk-in closet, two additional closets, and an ensuite bathroom with a tub and dual sinks. The second, third, and fourth bedrooms are generously sized, all with hardwood floors. The spacious fifth bedroom, currently used as a playroom, provides flexibility to be utilized as a bedroom, office, or any other desired purpose. The upper level laundry room offers ample space for convenient setup. A full hallway bath completes this level. The finished lower level is sure to be the heart of family gatherings with an open recreation room with another brick fireplace, wood stove and mantle. A convenient kitchenette, complete with sink, dishwasher, and beverage refrigerator, is positioned next to the light-filled French door leading to the rear patio and landscaped backyard. An additional room off the rec room can be used as you wish; a den, play room, office, craft room or additional storage. Finishing this level is a full bathroom, additional storage space and utility closets. Enjoy the comfort, versatility, acreage of this serene property.

Few miles to Fort Belvoir, Quantico, Pentagon, Old Towne Alexandria, Andrews Air Force Base, the White House & Congress, international airports! AgentRemarks: Welcome to your newly renovated, move in ready home! From top to bottom, this home has been completely redone! Move in comfortably knowing that everything is new, as if you are moving into a brand new home for the first time! New HVAC, New Roof, New EVERYTHING!  This gorgeous 3 bed, 3 bath garage townhome has new paint, new LVP flooring throughout all 3 levels along with newly installed recess lights/light fixtures, new kitchen quartz countertops, new kitchen cabinets, new SS appliances, and much more!  The entry level bedroom which walks out to the backyard of the home  is great for a home office, gym or private living space with a large closet, private bathroom and window and door. The lower level  bathroom has been completely renovated with new flooring, new vanity with quartz top, and an upgraded shower with a new shower glass door.  As you walk towards the upper level, you will finds yourself walking into an open concept layout that consists of a living, dining and beautifully redone oversized kitchen with new cabinets, quartz countertop, new backsplash and new stainless steel appliances. Right off the kitchen is a newly built oversized deck (staining in process), perfect for entertaining guests and bbq nights.  As you continue towards the 3rd level, there are two generously sized bedrooms, one of which is the master bedroom, private oversized bathroom which has been fully upgraded with new vanities/quartz top, new floor tiles along with new subway tiles throughout the shower along with a new shower glass door, toilet and light fixtures. There is also a newly renovated hallway bathroom that can be used for the secondary bedroom.  Don't miss out on your opportunity, SHOW NOW!  There is a community pool and location is within walking distance to the Metro - Innovation Center Metro Stop. Easy access to major commuting routes and Dulles Airport. Jump on Route 28, the Dulles Toll Road, Route 7.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this beautifully renovated corner lot home in the highly desirable Austin Ridge community! This stunning 5-bedroom, 3.5-bath residence is set on a generous 1/3-acre lot and offers an array of modern features and finishes. Step inside to discover a gorgeous kitchen equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and stylish ceramic tile. The main level boasts elegant wood floors throughout and features a cozy gas fireplace in the family room, which seamlessly flows from the kitchen. Natural light floods the space, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The bathrooms have been thoughtfully remodeled, and the fully finished basement is a true highlight. It includes a bedroom (not to code), a full bath, and a wet bar in the spacious rec room—perfect for hosting gatherings or enjoying quiet evenings. Step outside to the 16'x12' deck, ideal for fall evenings and entertaining guests. Additional amenities include a large 2-car garage and a sizable fenced backyard, providing ample space for outdoor activities and privacy, community swimming pool and more! Austin Ridge offers convenient access to shopping, medical facilities, and major routes including I-95, Quantico, and commuter lots. Don’t miss the chance to make this exceptional property your new home!

PublicRemarks: Impeccable  3-level townhouse-style condo nestled within the prestigious gated community of Parkside at Ashburn. This exquisite home features 3 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, providing ample space for comfortable living. Luxury vinyl plank flooring can be found throughout, adding a touch of elegance and warmth. The top floor is dedicated to two expansive master suites, each boasting large walk-in closets and private bathrooms, ensuring a serene retreat for rest and relaxation. The main level is an entertainer's dream, offering an open-concept layout that seamlessly integrates the living, dining, and kitchen areas. The gourmet kitchen, complete with a generous island, is perfect for preparing delicious meals and hosting gatherings. Enjoy your morning coffee or an evening drink on the balcony accessed from the dining area. The entry level provides a versatile third bedroom with a full bath, ideal for guests or as a home office. The one-car garage offers additional storage and convenience. Recent updates include a new AC system installed in 2023, updated bathrooms in 2022, and luxury vinyl plank flooring in 2022. Residents of Parkside at Ashburn enjoy a wealth of amenities, Gated Community,  ⁠Community Gym,  ⁠including a clubhouse, swimming pool, fitness center, playground, and sports courts. The community's prime location ensures easy access to the Dulles Toll Road, Silver Line Metro, One Loudoun, Leesburg Outlet, and Loudoun Station. For parking, utilize the driveway, any unmarked spaces.

AgentRemarks: Please schedule all showings and walkthroughs via Showingtime.
PublicRemarks: Welcome home to the highly sought-after community of Beech Tree Manor! Situated in a quiet cul de sac, this spacious five bedroom home boasts an open floorplan with plenty of updates on all four levels! On the main level, the expansive kitchen has been upgraded with stainless steel appliances, two-tone cabinets, quartz countertops, and a classic subway tile backsplash. You’ll be able to easily unload groceries with an exterior door leading directly between the kitchen and carport. Enjoy a casual meal in the light-filled eat-in area, with a gorgeous picture window flooding the space with natural light. Continue into the adjacent dining room, great for hosting dinner parties. Opening into the vast living room, this home’s layout is perfect for entertaining family and friends!  Upstairs, you’ll discover a large primary bedroom suite with a walk-in closet and refreshed en suite bathroom. Two additional sizable bedrooms share a renovated full bathroom with a double sink vanity and plenty of cabinet storage. Downstairs on the first lower level you’ll discover a recreation room with modern vinyl plank flooring, recessed lighting, and cozy fireplace. Two more private bedrooms and a recently renovated full bathroom with walk-in shower round out this level of the home. Down one more level, a second recreation room offers endless opportunities for bonus spaces like a home gym or media room, plus laundry and plenty of storage space. Step outside to enjoy the peacefulness of your huge fenced backyard and lovely stamped concrete patio, surrounded by mature trees for shade and privacy. On the front of the home, the carport and long driveway provide an abundance of room for parking. Just minutes to Giant Food, Aldi, Harris Teeter, Mosaic District, Eden Center, Seven Corners, Tyson’s Corner, Beech Tree Elementary, Holmes Run Stream Valley Park, Providence Recreation Center, and INOVA Fairfax. Quick access to I-495, Route 50, Gallows Road, Route 7, Columbia Pike, and Little River Turnpike. Schedule a private tour of your new home today!

The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

AgentRemarks: There may be an option to rent a garage space from another homeowner for $150/month. No smoking complex starting 9/1/2025.  Minimum criteria to qualify: income 40 times the monthly rent; good credit; good work history. Fees: 300 move-in fee; elevator reservation 100 with a 200 deposit. Moves are M-F 9 to 6. Rules/Regs are in the Documents section as well as a non-branded video. Enter via gate for parking pass; use photo ID for clients and your business card. Park in front of the building, enter the lobby and dial 288 to be buzzed in by guard. PublicRemarks: Lovely 2-bedroom/2-bath condo in resort-like Montebello. Tranquil treed views from the enclosed balcony. Lots of space and storage, and every room has flooring; you will have access to a secure storage space off of the garage as well. The kitchen includes some newer appliances, your own washer and dryer, and the heat pump is a year old! Conveniently located on the first floor of the building, the mailroom, lobby and library are just a few steps away. Option to rent a garage space for $150 may be available. OUR COMMUNITY:  Located in resort-like MONTEBELLO, just minutes from Alexandria. For commuters, you can use the short path to the Huntington Metro, or take the free shuttle that comes right to your building entrance Monday thru Friday. Just two traffic lights from Old Town, and one from the Beltway and Woodrow Wilson Bridge. 24/7 monitored security. Montebello offers a wide variety of amenities and entertainment, with a club or activity for all interests. As of 9/1 Montebello will be officially 'smoke free' with smoking banned inside all buildings. The community center is all NEW! The campus includes car CHARGING stations; new DOG RUN; indoor and outdoor pools; spa and sauna; tennis courts (and pickle ball); a bowling alley (brand-new with 4 lanes); a full-service restaurant with a bar; a convenience store and dry cleaning; a game room with billiards and ping-pong overlooking the indoor pool; gym with a treed view; a card room with a wide variety of games; and even an upscale hair salon. We have 24-hour monitored and patrolled security. >>> Montebello is unique among condos, with our 35 wooded acres with paths throughout for hiking or strolling. BBQ areas are also available for outdoor grilling. The building itself offers a hobby room and party room, as well as a heavy-duty washer/dryer. You will note loads of surface parking for you and your guests located right in front or in back of the building, and there is a path nearby to the Huntington Metro and shops and post office on N Kings Hwy. Handicapped spaces are in the back at the B3 level.***  If any questions, please ask! I have lived here for 17 years, know it well and love it.

AgentRemarks: Please contact Stephanie with Bay Property Management Group at smerritt@bmgnva.com or text 571-455-5185 with any questions you have about the property.  Schedule via ShowingTime.  Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable. Owner will consider non-aggressive, exotic, or, wild pets on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

The kitchen offers easy access to the deck, where you can soak in the morning sun. The upper level features a master suite with vaulted ceilings, a large walk-in closet, and an en-suite bath. Two additional bedrooms share an upgraded bathroom, providing ample space for family or guests. The fully finished lower level includes a versatile recreation room, a full bath, and walkout access to a stone-paved patio and a generous backyard. This home is conveniently located just minutes from major routes like the Dulles Toll Road, Dulles Airport, and the new Ashburn Metro Station. Enjoy nearby shopping and dining at Brambleton Town Center and One Loudoun. Don't miss out on this rare opportunity to rent a beautifully updated, east-facing end-unit townhome in a prime location!

For added convenience, the washer and dryer are located on the upper level. Ideally situated close to shopping centers, restaurants, and major commuter routes, this home is a must-see. Schedule your showing today and make this exceptional townhouse your new home!

PublicRemarks: Escape to this serene end-unit townhome, offering privacy and a peaceful setting overlooking a winding creek that feeds into Lake Montclair. With a beautifully landscaped yard and outdoor spaces designed for relaxation, this home feels like a private retreat. The country-style kitchen has been thoughtfully updated with hardwood floors, granite countertops, recessed lighting, and stainless steel appliances. Step outside to the cement and paver patio, perfect for enjoying nature or gathering around a fire pit. Upstairs, all bedrooms feature vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors. The primary suite includes a soaking tub for unwinding, while recent updates like a new roof and refreshed kitchen ensure a move-in-ready experience. This home offers a one-car garage with additional off-street parking, and the Southlake at Montclair community provides access to a variety of amenities including a pool, tennis and basketball courts, and playgrounds. Plus, Montclair residents enjoy access to boating, fishing, beaches, and membership opportunities at a private golf course.      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------All Richey Property Management residents must enroll in and purchase a Resident Benefits Package which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident’s credit score with timely rent payments, up to $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! More details and options provided upon application.

PublicRemarks: Available for rent or purchase. Tenants go to McEnearney website to apply.  Welcome to an extraordinary property in Alexandria. Nestled on over three quarters of an acre behind a gated entrance you will feel tucked away with lots of space to live, entertain and relax in. The home is almost 6,000 sq ft of expansive elegant living. Walking inside the front door you are greeted with vaulted ceilings and a grand staircase. The main level features formal living room and dining room, office and gourmet kitchen with island open to a vaulted ceiling family room with gas fireplace. Step out side the sliding doors to one of the most amazing yards in Alexandria. There you find a huge pool, hot tub, putting green, gazebo, tiki bar with out side kitchen. The yard is wired for music and beautiful lighting. There's still lots of room to add a pool house, or an auxiliary living unit. So much space! Back in side, the upper level has 4 bedrooms including a primary ensuite with gas fireplace, sitting area, double closets  and large bathroom. Heading down to the lower level there is another gas fireplace, lots of room for a pool or pingpong table, plus a theatre room, another bedroom and workout/extra room. The oversized two car garage is set up for electric car charging. Located  in the highly sought after Fort Hunt community, you have access to great youth sports programs, community centers, including the Mount Vernon Community Center which is currently receiving a multi-million dollar renovation that will feature two ice rinks, swimming pool, fitness area. Just south of Old Town Alexandria, it's great for commuting, just a couple of miles from hwy 495, it's also just a short 20 minute drive Reagan International .Airport. During the summer months you are steps away from a farmer's market for fresh produce, baked goods, plants and more. Also located close by is the Sherwood Hall Library. Come see this hidden gem for yourself! It's really a one-of-a-kind property.

PublicRemarks: ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED - Welcome home! Situated within the quaint Town of Quantico, within the secure Quantico Marine Base, this 2 bedroom townhome rental includes all utilities, including cable! Continue into the home and you’ll discover the spacious eat-in kitchen, featuring warm wooden cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Plush carpeted floors lead you upstairs , where both bedrooms include wide closets and private full bathrooms. Less than half a mile to the VRE/Amtrak Station, A M Market, Town Cafe, Quantico Municipal Park, Lillian Carden Community Center, and Quantico Marina on the Potomac River. Quick access to Route 1, I-95, Fuller Road, Russell Road, and Garrisonville Road. Come check out your new home today!

With 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and numerous upgrades, including new flooring throughout the house, newer carpet on the stairs, freshly painted kitchen cabinets, and new chandeliers. Upstairs, you'll find three bedrooms, including the spacious primary suite with an ensuite bathroom featuring dual vanities, a separate shower, and a relaxing soaking tub. The walkout lower level adds flexibility with a 4th bedroom or recreation room, complete with a full bathroom. Conveniently located less than a mile from the Rippon Station VRE, and just minutes from I-95 and the vibrant shops and dining at Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center, this home offers both style and convenience. Enjoy the natural beauty of the nearby Neabsco Boardwalk, Neabsco Creek, Occoquan Bay, and Potomac River, as well as Leesylvania State Park and marina. Plus, Riverside Station offers a fantastic clubhouse within walking distance, featuring a pool, gym, and more. In addition to the one-car garage, the home offers convenient guest parking nearby.

PublicRemarks: Discover this stunning corner townhome, perfectly prepared for its new tenants. This spacious residence features 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and 1 half bathrooms, offering comfort and modern living at its finest. As you enter, you'll be greeted by an open foyer with elegant hardwood floors, a convenient half bath, and a generous recreational room that opens up to a fenced backyard—ideal for outdoor relaxation. The upper level boasts a sun-drenched living room with an abundance of windows. The updated kitchen is a chef’s dream, complete with custom white cabinetry, a stylish backsplash, stainless steel appliances, a large kitchen island, and luxurious quartz countertops. Upstairs, the bedroom level presents three roomy bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The master suite is a true retreat, featuring vaulted ceilings, a cozy sitting area, a walk-in closet, and a private en-suite bathroom with a double vanity, standing shower, and a soaking tub. The additional two bedrooms share a second full bath, providing ample space and comfort. This home is freshly painted and equipped with recessed lighting throughout, as well as garage parking for added convenience. Situated in a prime location, this townhome is a commuter’s paradise. Just minutes away from Rippon VRE Station, you'll have easy access to Quantico Marine Base, Fort Belvoir, the Pentagon, Springfield/Alexandria metro stations, and DC’s Union Station. The VRE commuter train offers a stress-free alternative when parking is scarce. Enjoy the nearby amenities of Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center, Occoquan, Featherstone National Wildlife Refuge, and Neabsco Regional Park. Plus, with quick access to I-95, Prince William County parks, Potomac Mills Shopping Mall, and a variety of dining options, you'll have everything you need right at your doorstep. This townhome is not just a place to live—it's a lifestyle upgrade waiting for you.

This 2,000 square foot house sits on a 5590 square foot lot and features 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms (2 brand new). The top floor has a  bedroom with a  private bathroom. The main level has a large living room with fireplace, dining room, mud room, galley kitchen with gas stove, 2 bedrooms and full bathroom. The finished lower level has a huge rec room, bedroom, full bathroom, bonus room and washer and dryer in the unfinished portion of the basement. Walk out to rear backyard and spacious driveway that fits 4 cars.  See virtual tour to see more of the interior.

AgentRemarks: **PLEASE SCHEDULE SHOWINGS ONLINE ** Application Qualifications: We require minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, with only 2 incomes to qualify, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property.** Landlord does not allow pets or smoking. Welcome to 6209 Kerrwood St., where comfort meets convenience in this beautifully maintained 3-level townhouse in the heart of Burke. With 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and a half bath, this home offers everything you need for modern living. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by gleaming hardwood floors and an abundance of natural light that fills the home, thanks to the large bay window in the living room. The galley kitchen is both functional and inviting, offering plenty of counter space for meal prep and entertaining. Upstairs, the primary bedroom features an en suite bath, providing a private retreat at the end of the day. All the bathrooms have been thoughtfully upgraded, adding a touch of luxury throughout. The large finished walk-out basement offers versatile space, whether you need a family room, home office, or guest suite. Step outside to your deck, perfect for outdoor dining or enjoying a peaceful evening under the stars. With 2 assigned parking spaces and a prime location close to the VRE, commuting is a breeze. Don’t miss the chance to make 6209 Kerrwood St. your next home!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5317 Oldcastle Lane, a beautifully updated single-family home in the heart of Springfield, VA. This completely remodeled residence features 3 spacious bedrooms and 1.5 modern bathrooms, blending comfort with modern design.  Step inside to discover a bright and open interior, where every detail has been meticulously crafted. The home features newly installed flooring, fully renovated bathrooms, an updated laundry room and closets, fresh paint, and new contemporary fixtures, all creating a welcoming and airy atmosphere throughout. The centerpiece of the home is a large, open-concept living area that flows seamlessly into a brand-new kitchen, boasting new appliances, custom cabinetry, and Quartz countertops - perfect for both everyday living and entertaining guests.  Outside, you'll find a charming fully fenced backyard ideal for outdoor activities and relaxation. Located in a desirable neighborhood within the sought-after Lake Braddock Secondary school district, this home provides easy access to top schools, major commuter routes (minutes to 495, 395, VRE train stations, Metro bus stops), parks (Burke Lake Park, Lake Accotink Park), and shopping, making it a perfect choice for those seeking a modern and move-in-ready home in Northern Virginia.

Welcome to The Oakton, where this wonderful one level condo awaits! Enter the friendly, quiet neighborhood with tons of parking, nearby dog park, and community pool. The foyer welcomes you and your guests upon entering with tile flooring and fresh paint throughout. Boasting 1,324 sf, two spacious bedrooms, a sunroom/den, two bathrooms, large kitchen, and a dining area open to the huge living room, allows for plenty of room for all. The primary light filled bedroom has an en-suite bath and generous size walk-in closet. The living room with a cozy wood burning fireplace has a built-in shelf. The sunroom/den would be great for an office, exercise area, or crafting area and leads to the balcony, which is perfect for relaxing and entertaining. You will also love having a large separate laundry room with additional storage. An added bonus is the condo fee includes water and trash. Located in the highly desirable Oakton area with top rated schools, close proximity to fantastic restaurants, shopping, entertainment, and so many other great Oakton/Vienna/Tysons amenities. How convenient it is also being so close to the Vienna Metro, Route 123, I66, 495, Lee Highway, and other major commuter routes. Be sure not to miss this one!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Sorry, no pets. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.-------------------------Tenants are responsible for paying all condo association move fees prior to occupancy.

Formal dining room opens to the renovated kitchen with gleaming granite countertops, 42-inch cabinetry, and stainless-steel appliances. A lovely half bath rounds out the main level. Upstairs you’ll find 3 bright and cheerful bedrooms, including the master bedroom with private en suite bath, and a well-appointed hall bath. The lower level recreation room offers plenty of space for games, media, and relaxation, while another half bath and large laundry/storage room and 2 assigned parking spaces add convenience.  Enjoy all the fabulous amenities Reston has to offers! This is one you won’t want to miss!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of historic Manassas—a magnificent Craftsman residence built in 2019 that epitomizes modern luxury with timeless charm. This exquisite six-bedroom, five-and-a-half-bath masterpiece offers an unparalleled living experience, seamlessly blending classic elegance with contemporary comfort. Please remove shoes while touring! Thank you. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an inviting foyer with sophisticated chair railings and crown moldings that set the tone for the home’s refined interior. The spacious entry-level bedroom provides versatile living options, ideal for guests or multi-generational families seeking privacy and convenience. The heart of this home is its gourmet kitchen, a culinary haven designed to impress. Outfitted with premium upgraded countertops, a generous island, and state-of-the-art appliances—including a double oven, gas range, and built-in microwave—the kitchen is a chef’s delight. The adjoining family room, conveniently situated off the kitchen, creates a perfect setting for casual gatherings and everyday living. Rich wood floors grace the main living areas, enhancing the home’s warm and inviting atmosphere. Recessed lighting throughout highlights the beauty of the space, while elegant French and sliding glass doors seamlessly connect the indoors with the outdoors. The home’s energy-efficient Low-E windows and vinyl-clad frames ensure comfort year-round. The luxurious primary suite is a sanctuary of relaxation, featuring a spa-like bath designed for ultimate indulgence. Each additional bedroom and bath offers ample space and comfort, catering to the needs of a large or extended family.  An expansive utility provides additional storage or potential for future customization, adding to the home’s versatility. The beautiful  living room  fireplace,   ensures warmth and comfort through every season. Convenience is paramount with this property, as it is ideally situated in the historic district of Manassas. Enjoy easy access to transportation with Amtrak and the Virginia Railway Express (VRE) for smooth commuting. The Washington D.C. metro system, connected via Omni link bus service, further enhances connectivity. For frequent travelers, Dulles Airport is a mere 30 minutes away, and Reagan National Airport is just 50 minutes from your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the charm of historic Manassas with its vibrant array of local restaurants and boutique shops. This home is not only a residence but a gateway to a rich cultural and culinary experience. Everything you need to make your moving experience enjoyable and seamless is right here. This residence is a splendid choice for those seeking a blend of luxurious living and historic charm, making it an ideal setting for family life and cherished memories. Open house Sunday 1-3 on 30  August 25 -it may be easier to get in and out of you park around the corner. Apply on line-Call for details. Thanks

All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

Enjoy the convenience of basketball courts, volleyball courts, and a pool for your recreational needs. A pavilion is also available for hosting events. AgentRemarks: ***GREAT LOCATION**** 5 BEDROOM --3 BATH,***Exceptional curb appeal, remodeled open concept floor plan and a stellar locale await. Sited on a huge .68 acre (29,530 sq ft)  park-like lot nestled at the end of a long (“cul-de-sac like”) driveway. This magical setting also adjoins the nearly 27 acres of woodlands, trails, playground and sport courts that make up Fairfax County’s Kemper Park. This 5 bedroom, 3 bath all brick raised rambler offers 2,950 finished square feet of living areas. Enjoy the circular drive, covered portico entrance with double curved staircase entry, Oak hardwood floors, gracious entry foyer, 5 generous sized bedrooms (including a primary with bath ensuite) 3 remodeled baths, two fireplaces, sweeping living room with serene views, totally remodeled quartz/stainless island kitchen open to the dining room and onto the deck for easy summer time grilling and chilling. The daylight lower level offers sunny above grade windows, a convenient walk-out entrance. Recreation room complete with wet bar and plenty of space for your media room, pool table and a gaming area. Don’t miss all of the storage, utility/laundry room, and handy side load garage. From the long driveway (tucked way off of Hunter Mill Rd), overlooking the manicured grounds, you know you have arrived at a very special place. All conveniently located close to the myriad of renowned dining, shopping, entertainment, major transportation arteries and Metro options that make living in Vienna such a popular choice with today’s home buyers. Not to mention all of the employment, entertainment and transportation hubs of nearby Tysons, Oakton, Fairfax, Fair Oaks, Reston, Dulles and Washington, DC that only enhance this commuter’s dream locale status. LAWN MOWING, GUTTER CLEANING AND LEAF REMOVAL INCLUDED IN RENT.

AgentRemarks: *Plenty of first come/first serve parking spaces available*Access to the building is provided by the front desk* Please register at front desk prior to showing the unit*Lockbox is on the unit door*Please contact Listing agent regarding submitting online application/processing procedures * Living in this 3 bedroom, 2 full bath unit offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and community living. The light-filled living area provides a welcoming atmosphere, making it an ideal space for entertaining or simply relaxing after a long day. This spacious, sought after unit has a bright living room with a cozy balcony, a dining room and a previously updated kitchen with granite countertops and tile floors. All bedrooms have been updated with new carpets or LVT flooring and the entire unit has been painted. The bright primary bedroom has a spacious walk-in closet with shelves. The primary full bath has a tub shower, tile floors and it is located next to the primary bedroom on one side of the unit. On the other side of the unit, there are 2 other light-filled bedrooms with beautiful views. Both bedrooms have large closets. The second full bath has a tub shower and tile floors. There are plenty of closets along the hallway and a large pantry closet by the kitchen. Idylwood Tower comes with a range of amenities, including a fitness center, swimming pool, tennis courts and a tot lot, which fosters a sense of community among residents. The location is particularly advantageous, as you are just minutes away from major highways, making commutes to Washington, D.C. other surrounding areas easy. Additionally, the nearby neighborhoods offer parks, shopping centers and dining options, catering to various tastes and lifestyles.  With all theses features, living in this unit provides a perfect blend of suburban tranquility and urban accessibility, making it an ideal home for anyone seeking comfort and convenience in Northern Virginia.

AgentRemarks: Recently renovated with high-end materials and finishes, this beautiful home is a rare find! The owners spent many months meticulously designing and selecting all the custom features making this home a one-of-a-kind rental unit. They really do not want to move but due to job relocation, they are reluctantly renting out their home to one lucky tenant! The outdoor rear deck is also planned to be completed in a few weeks which adds additional features and outdoor living space.  The home has high-quality real solid walnut colored hardwood floors throughout the first and second level as well as matching oak stairs. The kitchen is perfectly matched with white quartz counter-tops with waterfall around the sitting area overlooking the dining room and exotic stone designed back splash. The soft close, white and gray solid wood cabinets have so many drawers that make kitchen tasks easier, matched perfectly with brass handles and glass doors.  High-end stainless-steel appliances, with smart features, induction cooktop and professional grade range hood. The laundry room is conveniently located next to the kitchen with high end washer and dryer, as well as a new soaking sink.  Laundry room connects to the two-car garage.  Upstairs you will find both the primary bathroom and hallway bathroom completely renovated with high-end finishes such as quartz countertops, 12x24 ceramic tiles, brass and black fixtures, large walk-in shower and led lights. New windows, doors, and other small features really make this home feel new inside. ***Tenant must have credit score over 700, income at least 3X the rent amount, good rental history, and no smoking allowed. One small hypoallergenic dog fully grown under 25lbs allowed with 500 pet deposit, 350 pet cleaning fee and 100 per month pet rent.***

PublicRemarks: Enjoy quiet, comfortable living in Bucknell Manor, with easy access to the Potomac River, Old Town Alexandria, and the beauty of Fort Hunt and Mount Vernon. This three-bedroom, two bath cape features hardwood floors, a recently updated main-level bedroom and beautiful full bathroom, with an additional two bedrooms and remodeled full bathroom upstairs. The main-level living room leads to the kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, including a gas range. Off the kitchen to the rear of the home is an additional room, well suited as an office, TV room, or rec room. Enjoy cool evenings on the massive new back deck while your pet friends enjoy the fenced backyard. The lengthy driveway provides off-street parking for two vehicles, and the large exterior shed is perfect storage for lawn equipment and personal belongings. In addition to the wonderful amenities of this 1,188-square-foot home, the location is fantastic. The Mount Vernon Trail alongside the Potomac River is just one mile from the front door. Explore the colonial charm of Old Town Alexandria, just about 10 minutes away, or head south to check out George Washington’s Mount Vernon, about 15 minutes away. There’s an abundance of shopping throughout the area as well, with Belle View and Beacon Hill shopping centers both within a mile, not to mention the abundance of restaurants in Old Town, Fort Hunt, and the surrounding area.

The expansive deck is perfect for relaxing and meditation, while the large, private backyard is ideal for outdoor BBQs and gatherings of all sizes. The wood-burning outdoor fireplace adds a cozy touch to your outdoor entertainment. Enjoy the peace and quiet of a tree-lined lot.  Kids' Play Area: Includes a trampoline with slides and a seesaw, ensuring hours of fun for your children. A complete table tennis set for endless entertainment. Enjoy fresh, delicious fruit from your own persimmon tree. Benefit from brand new appliances, a new roof, and a state-of-the-art HVAC system ensuring your comfort and peace of mind year-round. Nearby parks, golf courses, wineries, and horse-riding stables offer endless outdoor recreation opportunities.  High rating school pyramid. There is a basement that is rented separately to a single person with separate entrance. Only main and second level for rent.

PublicRemarks: Mediterranean Villa at the heart of Woodside Estates ( can be leased furnished) will also consider purchase offers- A captivating European inspired mansion on a sprawling almost 2 acre privately fenced, gated property accessed up by a privately manicured circular driveway! This exclusive masterpiece nestled high on a hill dominating above all the other multi-million-dollar homes in the area features designer materials, imported fixtures, and thoughtfully designed spaces, offering the utmost in resort-style living. On the main floor, you will find an imperial chef's kitchen featuring Italian Pedini Cabinetry with marble countertops, custom millwork, and professional grade Viking appliances. Ascend the staircase to the upper-level lounge leading to the luxurious primary suite with enormous multiple windows that perfectly frame the oasis-like backyard. The remainder of the four secondary en-suite bedrooms are spacious and well-appointed. The lower walk out level features a ballroom style open floor plan with a dance floor, a custom-made bar, custom home theater, dry sauna, and a gym. A true retreat, the expansive backyard features an outdoor kitchen and dining area, lush, grassy lawn, fire pit, and sparkling infinity edge pool and spa complete with Baja step and lounge area perfect for quintessential Northern Virginia entertaining. This magnificent residence offers a rare opportunity to live in a home rich in design and attention to detail, utilizing the highest quality materials in one of the world's most coveted zip codes just minutes away from the best nightlife, restaurants, and shopping neighboring Tysons Corner and Washington DC have to offer.

PublicRemarks: Austin Ridge’s Finest: 9 Gallery Road – A Stunning 5-Bedroom Colonial Welcome to 9 Gallery Road, where pride of ownership is evident from the moment you arrive. This beautiful 5-bedroom, 4-bath colonial is nestled in the heart of Austin Ridge and offers everything you need for luxurious living. The curb appeal is undeniable, with meticulously landscaped front and rear yards. The charming front porch welcomes you to the home, providing the perfect spot to unwind after a long day. As you step inside, the elegance of rich hardwood floors greets you in the foyer and extends into the formal dining room and family room. The formal living room exudes a stately ambiance, complete with columns and crown molding. The formal dining room is equally impressive, featuring a bay window, chair rail, and decorative custom moldings. The gourmet kitchen is a chef’s dream, boasting granite countertops, upgraded cabinetry with crown molding, double ovens, a gas range, a center island, a built-in desk area, recessed lighting, and a spacious walk-in pantry that can easily accommodate a second refrigerator or freezer. The ceramic tile flooring and backsplash add a touch of sophistication to the space. The family room is truly a showstopper, with its dramatic two-story ceiling and abundant natural light streaming through numerous windows. The floor-to-ceiling gas fireplace creates a cozy focal point. The main level also includes a bedroom with carpet and a full bath perfect for the parents/in-laws or guests. The laundry room has been updated with matching ceramic tile flooring and wainscot, adding both style and functionality. Upstairs, the expansive master suite offers a luxurious retreat with two walk-in closets, a sitting area, a fireplace hookup, and a tray ceiling. The master bath has been elegantly updated with a tile floor, dual vanities, a walk-in tiled shower, a soaking tub, and a spacious linen closet. Two additional bedrooms with generous closets and a full bath complete the upper level, along with a versatile loft area perfect for an office or playroom. The finished basement is a sports fanatic’s dream, featuring a bar area with recessed lighting and billiards-ready flooring. It also includes a legal 5th bedroom with a full bath and home gym area. Situated on an impeccably manicured corner lot, this property is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts. The fully fenced backyard features a slate stone patio, a retractable awning, a 10 x 8 shed, and a 9-zone sprinkler system. Home features solar panels which create enough power to virtually have no electric bill! Austin Ridge offers a prime location just 5 minutes from I-95, with easy access to walking and biking trails, shopping, and dining. Publix Market is only 1.8 miles away, and commuting to MCB Quantico, Fort Belvoir, the DC Metro Area, and the Pentagon is a breeze. This home is a must-see! Schedule your showing today and be sure to check out our virtual tour. Don't miss this GEM!!! All GEM Realty residents are enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $39.95/month which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident’s credit score with timely rent payments, up to $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, on-demand pest control, and much more! More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Experience unparalleled luxury at the award-winning Verse at The Boro Tysons. Perfectly situated above Whole Foods and a variety of dining options, you'll also be just minutes from the Tysons Corner Mall and Tysons Galleria, with quick access to Washington, DC and IAD airport via car or the Greensboro Station on the Silver Line. Tysons offers the ultimate blend of work, play, and lifestyle! This one-bedroom unit features stunning balcony views of the Tysons skyline, custom coat and walk-in closets, Italian cabinetry with concealed kitchen appliances, quartz countertops, a waterfall island, and blackout electric curtains in the bedroom for optimal rest. Enjoy a luxurious marble walk-in shower and elegant marble floor tiles throughout. Additionally, the unit includes a dedicated one-car garage parking spot and a convenient storage unit. The Verse provides exceptional amenities, including 24-hour concierge service, a fitness room and yoga studio, a beautiful lounge, a private outdoor patio, a shared Skypark and pool, and an Amazon Hub Locker for convenience. This rental is available furnished or unfurnished to suit your needs. LISTING AGENT IS THE OWNER.

Please see flyer attached in document section of listing**

AgentRemarks: Thank you for showing! I'm here to help anyway I can.  1. Accompanied Showings: - All prospects interested in viewing properties must be accompanied by a licensed real estate agent at all times during their visit. Please ensure compliance to maintain the security and professionalism of the showing process. Request Showing: Email: AngelHomeTeam@Gmail.com   SUBJECT:  Show Request { Property Address} Please  include date and time to receive instructions.  2. Security of Access Codes: - Do not share the combination to the lockbox or any access codes with prospects. These are provided solely for the use of licensed agents to maintain property security. 3. Submitting Applications: - All rental applications must be submitted online. Direct your clients to apply through the Pathlight website for processing. The direct link for application submission is [Pathlight Property Management](https://pathlightmgt.com/).
PublicRemarks: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this charming home,  in the heart of Port O Dumfries Community.   This home features  3 bedrooms and 2.5 modern bathrooms, ensuring ample space for relaxation and privacy. The living areas are bathed in natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere throughout the home. Ready June 20th. Professionally managed by Pathlight Property Management, the exclusive property manager for Home Partners of America, offering excellent customer service, 24/7 emergency maintenance service, online application and payments, and pet-friendly.  To make your move-in smooth, trash, sewer, and water services are maintained in the owner’s name and are available at the time of move-in. A utility service charge will be charged monthly, along with a one-time fee; all other utilities, such as electricity and gas, need to be maintained in the resident’s name. To better serve our residents, Pathlight is pet-friendly with no breed restrictions.  In most states, there is a one-time $300 non-refundable pet deposit and $30 monthly pet rent. Service and assistance animals are exempt from any restrictions or pet fees with proper documentation. If your home has a pool, there is a $100 monthly pool fee. To ensure the best care for your HVAC system and, in turn, the air quality in your home, Pathlight offers an optional $15 fee for bi-monthly filter service. Broker participation welcome, so please contact your leasing agent for more information. For additional information on our application process and lease fees, please visit our online help center. Advertised rental prices and promotions are subject to change at any time.   **ALERT: If you see an ad for this home on Craigslist or Facebook Marketplace, please notify Listing Agent.  We do not advertise any of our homes on Craigslist or Facebook Marketplace and it is likely fraud.**

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this stunning Belvedere model, where over 3100 sq ft of elegant living space awaits you. This charming home features unique bump-outs on all three levels, adding character and extra space. Enjoy the warm ambiance of hardwood floors throughout, a sunny and inviting sunroom, and a dream kitchen with a large island and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. Unwind in the cozy family room or retreat to the luxurious primary bedroom, complete with a separate sitting area and a spacious walk-in closet. The en-suite bathroom is your personal spa, featuring a soaking tub and a separate shower. Convenience is key with main-level laundry, a finished walk-up basement with a full bathroom, and a beautiful paver patio with LED lighting that leads to a generous backyard—ideal for relaxation and entertaining. This home is equipped with modern features such as a 50 amp RV socket, hot water access in the garage, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, and recent updates including a new roof (2015), HVAC system (2019), and kitchen appliances (2022). Located near I95, Route 1, and Route 234, and just 3 miles from Quantico, you’ll have easy access to Potomac Town Center, Wegmans, Potomac Mills Mall, and local parks.

AgentRemarks: Stunning four-level, END UNIT townhome nestled within a quiet community in Alexandria. Hardwood floors flow throughout the main level including the light-filled living room with a lovely bay window that frames views over the street. Well-appointed eat-in kitchen will appeal to the eager cook with updated stainless steel appliances and ample counter space. All bedrooms are well-sized and there are 3.5 bathrooms along with an updated utility room, and a one-car garage.  BONUS...HUGE loft/office area above primary bedroom.  Outside, there’s a sun-soaked deck where you can host guests.  Fully finished, walkout lower level through sliding glass doors to low-maintenance, fenced-in rear yard.  Gas fireplace in lower level family room.  The vibrant Kingstowne Towne Center is only moments from this picture-perfect town home.  You’re also close to schools, parks, hiking trails and the Greendale Golf Course. For absolute convenience, you can also be in the heart of Alexandria in approximately 16 minutes. Mins. to military bases and 2 metros.  All applicants must apply online at the Independent Property Management website.  Call listing agent.  There is a $45 non-refundable application fee. All adult occupants must submit an application. Once applications are submitted, each applicant will receive an email requesting their approval to run a Basic Tenant Screening (which includes a "soft pull" of the applicant's credit). Applicants must also provide proof of income and employment - or two years of tax returns if self employed. All completed applications and income/employment information will be presented to the property owner for consideration. Owner makes the final decision. There are no guaranteed approvals. Please call listing agent with any questions.

AgentRemarks: 4-Level Townhouse in Gated Community – Available Now Discover this elegant 4-level townhouse located in a charming gated community. The home boasts a spiral staircase that gracefully leads to the main living quarters, featuring stunning hardwood floors throughout the main level. Enjoy cozy evenings in the family room with a fireplace, or step out onto the balcony with a pergola ceiling for outdoor relaxation and entertaining.  The lower level has a full bathroom, built in cabinets and desk for office space use with access to the backyard bricked patio. Highlights: Living Space: The open floor plan includes high-quality finishes and trim in the dining and living rooms, with ceilings reaching nine and ten feet high. Natural light streams through tall windows, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. Kitchen & Appliances: The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Additional upgrades include a central vacuum system and two fireplaces. Bedrooms & Bathrooms: Primary Bedroom: Features a slanted ceiling, ample closet space, and an ensuite bathroom with a shower and soaking tub. Second Bedroom: Ideal for an office or guest room, with its own full bath. Fourth Level: Includes a bedroom, full bath, and a cozy sitting area, offering privacy and flexibility. Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the private balcony off the living room, perfect for entertaining, and a fenced patio off the office/recreation room, providing added privacy. Location: Situated less than a mile from Tyson’s Metro stations and Mall, with excellent access to major routes such as Rte 7, 123, 66, and the beltway. This townhouse is available immediately and offers both luxury and convenience in a sought-after location. Don’t miss the chance to make this your new home!

You'll also appreciate the large garage with remote access and room for extra storage, plus an additional reserved parking space. This prime location offers unparalleled convenience, with everything you need just 10 minutes away, including Fairfax Towne Center, Fair Lakes Shopping Center, Fair Oaks Mall, Fairfax Corner, and a variety of grocery stores like Whole Foods, Wegmans, ALDI, and Trader Joe's. PublicRemarks: Welcome to 1051 Kelso Road, a magnificent all-brick colonial nestled on a beautifully manicured lot. This home offers a total of 7 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms, providing ample space for comfortable living. The expansive main level features a large eat-in kitchen, ample-sized living and dining rooms, a cozy family room, and a convenient bedroom and ensuite full bath, ideal for multi-generational living. Additional highlights include an enormous, fully conditioned sunroom, deck, two fireplaces, a convenient powder room, a large laundry room, and an oversized three-car garage.  The upper level showcases four bedrooms, one of which has been converted into a home office, and two full baths, providing flexibility for various living arrangements. The primary suite has a fireplace, two walk-in cedar closets, and a full bath with a soaking tub and stall shower. With a separate entrance from inside the home or from the private rear patio, the basement is perfectly designed as an au pair or in-law suite. It has a full kitchen, three additional rooms, a large walk-in closet, and a full bath. This space also includes its own washer and dryer, so those living here can be completely independent. The basement also contains lots of additional storage space.  Please note that the property is on a total of six acres. Four acres of the property, including the stables and adjacent paddocks, are used as horse boarding facilities. Tenants will have full access to the fully fenced two-acre parcel that the house sits on, and all lawn care is included in the rent.   Minimum rental requirements include a 12-month lease and no more than two incomes to qualify.

PublicRemarks: Experience the charm of this first-time rental townhome in the picturesque Hallcrest Heights, conveniently located near downtown McLean, Tysons Corner, and within walking distance to the McLean Metro Station. This beautifully renovated townhome boasts a fully updated interior, featuring an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a bay window overlooking the landscaped backyard. The window treatments are all Hunter Douglas, adding both elegance and functionality to each room. The main floor also includes a separate dining room, spacious living room, and a powder room. The light fixtures in the kitchen, dining room, and stairs were selected carefully to complement the home's interior color and finished palette, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. Additionally, recessed lighting throughout the home adds a modern touch and enhances the overall atmosphere. The basement level offers a bonus room ideal for a home office, a full bathroom, and a welcoming living area with a wood-burning fireplace, wet bar, and full fridge. Step outside to the beautiful backyard with a flagstone patio, featuring a semicircular knee-high stone wall surrounded by carefully selected plants and soft lighting, perfect for relaxing and unwinding with friends and family. On the third floor, you'll find a spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and a large walk-in closet, along with two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. The hall bathroom features a luxurious soaking tub, perfect for unwinding after a long day. The bathrooms were all renovated in 2016, featuring natural stone finishes, with marble adorning the entire master bath and basement bathroom floor. Freshly painted, this property exudes a delightful ambiance with hardwood floors throughout. This townhome is a commuter's dream, with easy access to 495, 267, Rt 7, and Rt 123, as well as close proximity to the toll-free Dulles International Airport access road. It also includes 2 assigned parking spaces, ample visitor parking, and access to community green spaces.

The main level boasts gleaming hardwood floors in the formal living and dining areas, leading to a spacious, eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, abundant cabinets, and a separate pantry. The kitchen opens to an expansive rear deck, offering privacy and serene views of mature trees and wooded parkland. Upstairs, the large primary bedroom features a vaulted ceiling, walk-in closet, and a private en-suite bathroom with a combination bathtub and shower. Two additional bedrooms share an updated hall bathroom and a linen closet. The finished walkout basement includes a rec/family room with a cozy wood-burning stove, a laundry room, and two generous storage areas. Recent updates total $50,000 and include a new roof, siding, trim, refurbished deck, sliding doors, cleaned carpets, painted interiors, privacy fences, new gutters, and a new patio. AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Bright & Beautifully Renovated Falls Church Home!  This sun-drenched, two-level house boasts gleaming wood floors, fresh paint, and updates throughout.  The light and open kitchen with cathedral ceilings and exposed beams boasts a window wall, island with seating, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, table space and outdoor access.  You'll love cooking and entertaining off of the adjacent patio in the expansive, fully fenced yard.  The other side of the kitchen joins the open concept living and dining areas; the layout lends to an abundance of natural light and a cohesive home hub.   Down the hall, there's a full bath and two generously sized bedrooms; a half bath and laundry room complete the main floor.  The upper floor offers brand new luxury vinyl flooring and zoned heating & cooling; perfect for overnight guests and a home office!  Conveniently located on a quiet residential street that's walking distance to parks, schools, and small shopping centers.  Destination restaurants and retail like the Mosaic District or Seven Corners are only a mile in either direction; the perfect spot for a quick commute to work, school, or entertainment areas!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5829 Stream Pond Ct, a charming rental property in the heart of Centreville, VA, offering both comfort and convenience in one of the area's most desirable locations. Enjoy the prime location!  Nestled in a tranquil community, this home is just minutes away from major commuter routes, shopping centers, restaurants, and top-rated schools. Enjoy easy access to I-66, Route 28, and Route 29, making your daily commute a breeze. Spacious Bedrooms!  Each of the generously sized bedrooms provides plenty of space for relaxation and rest. The master suite offers a peaceful retreat with ample closet space and an en-suite bathroom featuring a soaking tub and a spacious double vanity.   The additional bedrooms are perfect for family, guests, or even a home office.  The hall bath also offers a double vanity for added convenience. Bright and Airy Living Spaces: The open-concept living area is filled with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The living room flows seamlessly into the dining area, making it ideal for both casual family time and entertaining guests. Well-Equipped Kitchen: The kitchen is designed for both functionality and style, featuring a brand new gas stove, plenty of cabinet space, a bright bay window and a convenient layout that makes meal prep a joy. Private Outdoor Space: Step outside to a private deck, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee, weekend BBQs, or simply relaxing in the fresh air.  A patio on the ground level offers additional outdoor space and privacy. Community Amenities ;As a resident of this community, you’ll have access to amenities such as walking trails, parks, and more, adding to the overall appeal of this wonderful home. The blend of spacious living areas and a prime location makes this property a fantastic option for anyone looking to enjoy the best of Centreville living. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make 5829 Stream Pond Ct your new home. Schedule a viewing today and experience the perfect combination of comfort, space, and convenience!

AgentRemarks: Recently Updated Single-Family Home on a Spacious 1.7-Acre Lot in Leesburg Surrounded by multi-million dollar homes and with no HOA, this beautifully renovated single-family home offers the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and convenience. Situated on 1.7 acres, the property features refinished solid hardwood flooring throughout the main and upper levels, with carpet and luxury vinyl plank (LVP) flooring on the lower level. The home boasts brand new appliances, a new washer and dryer conveniently located on the main level, and a generous 1,280 sq ft wrap-around porch. The main level includes a formal dining room, a spacious living room, an eat-in kitchen perfect for family meals, and a library/office room. The master bedroom comes with an attached full bathroom, while two additional bedrooms and a second full bathroom provide ample space for family or guests. There's also access to a covered porch, offering a serene outdoor space to unwind and enjoy the scenic surroundings. The fully finished lower level includes a dedicated home office (which can be used as a bedroom, though not to code) and an additional full bathroom. A walk-up basement entrance provides easy access to the backyard, enhancing the versatility and functionality of this space. The expansive property features open areas and mature trees, offering both privacy and natural beauty. Conveniently located near major roads and local amenities, this home ensures easy access to shopping centers like Brambleton Town center, schools, healthcare facilities, and recreational areas.

AgentRemarks: Please contact Sharon with Bay Property Management Group at scail@bmgnva.com or call 703-843-6495 with any questions you have about the property.
