We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable Owner will consider cats and small dogs on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to Sully Station! This gorgeous end unit townhome with garage boasts an open floor plan, high ceilings, and an abundance of natural light. In the fully renovated eat-in kitchen, you’ll find sleek granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a spacious breakfast room. The light-filled living room features large floor-to-ceiling windows and a cozy gas fireplace. With modern elegant architectural features, the adjacent formal dining room is perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, the expansive primary suite includes a stunning vaulted ceiling, walk-in closet, and spa-like en suite bathroom. Two additional bedrooms both feature dramatic high ceilings and large closets, with a second full bathroom in the hall. The lower level of the home offers an additional living space with beautiful built-in shelving, a private fourth bedroom, and third full bathroom. From this level, walk out onto the patio to relax in your fenced backyard, or enjoy your morning cup of coffee on the wide wooden deck with a peaceful tree-lined surround. On the front of the home, the one car garage and driveway provide you with plenty of space for storage and parking. Community playground right next door! Minutes to Wegmans, Giant, Walmart, Costco, Dulles Expo Center, Cub Run Stream Valley Park, Udvar-Hazy Center, and Dulles Airport.  Quick access to Braddock Road, Westfields Boulevard, Route 66, Route 28, and Route 50. Schedule a private tour of your beautiful new home today!

OwnerName: David S Or Julie V Patterson
AgentRemarks: For* QUICKEST *response please text agent – 571-284-8007 To apply please visit our website - https://www.managementpros.com/rental-application/ More information in the document section of the MLS.  Please be sure you are using the correct combo box for entry -full details on showing instructions are sent after a showing has been confirmed through the MLS.  NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call.  $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents!  See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. --------------------------------------------------------  Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household.  Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. --------------------------------------------------------  Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card).  If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Also listed For Sale: VAFX2184984. Welcome to 1149 Colonial Rd, an exquisite three-level townhome nestled in a charming, picturesque McLean neighborhood. This spacious 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence, boasting top-to-bottom renovations, is designed to captivate your heart and elevate your lifestyle. The inviting main level, with hardwood floors, is bathed in natural light from generous, energy-efficient windows, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and ample pantry storage. Enjoy breakfast or your morning coffee by the serene bay window overlooking the front yard and community park. Adjacent to the kitchen, the separate dining room is ideal for hosting elegant dinner parties or larger gatherings with family and friends. The expansive living room features a cozy fireplace, surrounded by built-in bookcases that offer a refined display for your cherished literary collection. A large three panel sliding glass door will fill the space with natural light, perfect for relaxation and entertainment. From the living room, step out to the gorgeous Georgetown patio that provides a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living, with ample space for grilling, a firepit, and al fresco dining. A professionally installed 55-inch flat panel TVs add a modern touch, while recessed lighting enhances the ambiance. A powder room completes this level. Upstairs, you'll find three spacious bedrooms all with hardwood floors, each providing a tranquil retreat for rest and rejuvenation. The bright primary suite offers ample space for a king-sized bed and more. The ensuite bath, also fully renovated, includes a double vanity, enhancing the sense of luxury. Venture to the lower level, where a fourth bedroom or office and a full bath await. This floor also includes a laundry and utility room with additional storage, and a family room featuring a fireplace another professionally installed 55-inch flat panel TV and a wet bar. This versatile space is perfectly suited for entertaining and offers endless possibilities. Ample parking and a location steps away from a private neighborhood park add to the convenience of this home. Situated in a lush, vibrant community, this townhome is just half a mile from the shops and restaurants in downtown McLean. Ideally located inside the Beltway, with close proximity to I-495, GW Parkway, and the Tysons Silver Line Metro, and less than 5 miles from DC and Tysons, this home offers unparalleled convenience. Don’t miss the opportunity to live in this extraordinary and rarely available McLean townhome!!

Location, Location Location! This recently renovated 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment with 885 sq. ft. in the heart of Arlington is just minutes away from....well, just about everything!  One minute to I-66, 6 minutes to DC, 1.2 miles -- walking distance -- to 3 Orange Line Metro Stations.  Shopping, dining, gas, everything is close! Just minutes to Clarendon and the nightlife, fine dining, you name it.  The unit itself is on the second story, above an adorable little Asian bakery and cafe.  Walk in through the front door, and a natural light from a skylight greets you.  The renovated bath features dual vanities, granite counters,  and a tub/shower combo.  Two bedrooms each provide ample space.  The renovated kitchen has brand new stainless steel appliances, (range, dishwasher, fridge), new counters, and room enough for a dining table. A den provides space for another bed if desired, as well as the clothes washer and dryer. A small room in the rear leads to a rear exterior staircase, which leads to a parking area where you can park one vehicle off-street.  There is street parking with time limitations nearby as well.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream Colonial home, nestled within the highly coveted Langley School Pyramid. This residence has been meticulously remodeled, presenting three finished levels of sophisticated, 3,000 square feet of finished luxurious living space. Upon entry, you'll be welcomed by a light-filled living room, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The adjacent family room, featuring a beautifully refinished wood-burning fireplace and a wall of built-ins, offers a cozy yet elegant ambiance. The formal dining room is ideal for hosting dinner parties, while the adjoining breakfast room provides a casual space for morning meals. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, boasting top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, gleaming granite countertops, recessed lighting, and ample cabinet space, making it both functional and stylish. Upstairs, the home offers four generously sized bedrooms, including a serene and private primary suite. This retreat includes a luxurious bathroom with modern finishes and a spacious walk-in closet that will cater to your storage needs with ease. The lower level is a true entertainer's paradise, featuring a second refinished fireplace that adds warmth and charm to the space. The walk-out basement is complete with a full bath, a wet bar, and an additional bedroom, perfect for guests or as a private office.  Step outside to your personal oasis—a stunning swimming pool with a spa, all set within a fully fenced, private lot that backs to tranquil woods. Whether you're hosting summer gatherings or enjoying a peaceful evening swim, this outdoor space is the perfect backdrop for creating lasting memories.  There is an electric car charging port in the garage. Conveniently located just minutes from Fairfax County Parkway, Reston Town Center, Tysons Corner, and Dulles Airport, this home offers the ultimate combination of luxury and convenience in one exceptional package. Don't miss the opportunity to make this extraordinary property your own! Owner will pay for landscaping and pool maintenance.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to highly-sought after Cameron Station! This luxurious brick front townhome boasts gorgeous modern finishes on all 4 levels in the rarely available Somerset model. The spacious main level of the home offers an open floorplan with gleaming hardwood floors and an abundance of windows flooding the space with natural light. In the stunning chef’s kitchen you’ll discover a plethora of contemporary Shaker-style cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a classic tile backsplash.  Pull up a stool to the wrap-around breakfast bar or enjoy a casual meal in the adjoining morning room. With an open concept and cozy gas fireplace, this home is ideal for hosting dinner parties and entertaining. Upstairs, all four bedrooms feature plush carpeting and large closets. The primary bedroom includes a bright and modern en suite bathroom with a double sink vanity, soothing soaking tub, and frameless glass door shower. On the top level, the light-filled loft with a dramatic vaulted ceiling would work as a 5th bedroom, playroom, or guest space. On the lower level of the home you’ll find the lovely home office with beautiful built-in shelves and sophisticated crown molding. Step outside onto your private balcony off the kitchen and enjoy your morning coffee or outdoor dining in peace. With a two-car garage, wide driveway, and additional parking, you have plenty of parking options for yourselves and visitors.  This popular community offers an abundance of amenities including an outdoor pool, fitness center, metro shuttle, and more. Minutes to Safeway, Harris Teeter, BJ’s Wholesale, Ben Brenman Park, Patrick Henry Rec Center, Old Town Alexandria, The Pentagon, Amazon HQ2, and Reagan International Airport.  Quick access to Eisenhower Metro Station, Duke Street, I-395, I-495, King Street, Eisenhower Avenue, and Van Dorn Street. Schedule a private tour of your gorgeous new home today!

AgentRemarks: Discover the charm of this stunning, fully furnished 3-level townhouse in the historic Fairlington Arbor Community. Spanning 1,500 sqft, this 2-bedroom, 2-bath home offers an inviting blend of modern comfort and classic elegance. Nestled among mature trees, the community boasts an array of amenities designed for your enjoyment. The home features a versatile den or guest room in the finished basement, perfect for visitors or a home office, along with the convenience of an assigned parking spot. As you approach, you’re greeted by a welcoming front stoop leading to an entryway with a spacious coat closet. Inside, the sun-drenched, open-concept living and dining rooms are adorned with detailed crown molding and gleaming hardwood floors. The master bedroom offers two large closets, and ample storage is found throughout the home, including in the additional bedrooms and hallways. The fully finished basement is a standout feature, complete with a cozy family room, a versatile den or spare guest room, a full bathroom, and laundry facilities. Step outside to your private, fenced-in backyard—an ideal space for entertaining, grilling, or simply relaxing amidst the greenery. The backyard is equipped with outdoor furniture and a grill, making it a perfect extension of your living space. The Fairlington community is rich with amenities, including a community center, pool, tennis courts, a state-of-the-art playground, and a vibrant farmers market. Enjoy the convenience of nearby Bradlee Shopping Center, Shirlington Village, I-395, and easy access to DC, The Pentagon, Del Ray, Old Town, and more. With its prime location, excellent condition, and array of features, this townhouse is a perfect place to call home. Please note, there is a non-refundable pet fee of $500. Don’t miss this opportunity to live in one of Northern Virginia’s most desirable communities!

AgentRemarks: Please contact Stephanie with Bay Property Management Group at  smerritt@bmgnva.com or text 571-455-5185 with any questions you have about the property.  Schedule via Showing Time.   Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.
PublicRemarks: Stunning 3 Bed 3.5 Bath Brick Colonial Townhome In Vibrant Kingstowne Community * Welcome to your next home! This gorgeous Colonial townhome offers a blend of elegance and modern living. You're greeted by a 2-story foyer leading to a bright and spacious living area refined with high ceilings, tall windows, crown molding, and hardwood floors. An open floorplan for seamless flow between the living areas, with a combination kitchen and dining area that's perfect for entertaining. A fully equipped gourmet kitchen boasting granite countertops, a central island, and stainless steel appliances. The family room is right next to it with easy access to the deck for relaxation. Retreat to the spacious primary bedroom with vaulted ceilings, double closets, and a luxurious attached bathroom, complete with a soaking tub, glass-enclosed shower, and upgraded vanity. Comfortable bedrooms with good closet sizes for storage. The lower-level recreation room, ideal for relaxation or hosting guests. Full-size washer and dryer with organization closet making laundry a breeze. Step outside to enjoy the back deck and covered patio, perfect for unwinding. The 2-car attached garage provides safety for vehicles and ample storage. Enhance your lifestyle with a variety of amenities, including tennis and volleyball courts, a gym, a pool, and tot lots/playgrounds. A short distance from the Metro, making it convenient for commuters. This property has professional management, has 24-Hr emergency maintenance, and an online tenant portal. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application. Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant’s portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property.

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Discover your serene retreat from the bustle of Beltway life in this exquisite brick two-level home, nestled on a quiet cul-de-sac on a sprawling half-acre lot. Step inside and be captivated by the gleaming hardwood floors, elegant recessed lighting, and abundant natural light that fills the spacious, open main level. (The windows throughout the home were replaced in 2021.) The inviting living room, complete with a charming bay window and cozy wood-burning fireplace, flows seamlessly into a dedicated dining area and an updated kitchen. Culinary enthusiasts will love the kitchen’s granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas range, and built-in pantry. This level also boasts three generous bedrooms, including a serene primary suite with an updated en-suite bathroom. A second full, recently updated bathroom and a linen closet provide additional convenience. Outdoor living is a delight with direct access from the dining room to an expansive deck that spans the length of the home, offering stunning views of the private, fully fenced backyard. This tranquil oasis features mature trees, a whimsical tree swing, and two practical storage sheds. The lower level is designed for relaxation and entertainment, featuring a vast family room with a brick fireplace, new carpeting, and direct backyard access. A large fourth bedroom with a unique storage area (perfect as a hidden playhouse) and a third full bathroom offer plenty of space for family and guests. The laundry/utility area on this level provides ample storage, ensuring a clutter-free living environment. Conveniently located just minutes from shopping, dining, parks, and bike trails. This home is a commuter’s dream with easy access to the George Washington Memorial Parkway, Route 1, the Capital Beltway, Metro, DC, the Pentagon, Fort Belvoir, Quantico, and several Maryland bases, including Bolling AFB and Andrews Joint Base. Embrace the perfect blend of peaceful living and urban convenience. Pets are considered on a case-by-case basis with a deposit. PublicRemarks: OPEN HOUSE - Sunday, September 1 from 1-2 p.m.  Nestled in the heart of Dunn Loring/Vienna, Virginia, this 3-level brick townhome with 3 spacious bedrooms, 3.5 baths offer the perfect balance of convenience, comfort, and charm. With a generous floor area of approximately 2,204 square feet, this free-flowing layout is graced with large, inviting windows that fill each room with pleasant views. The front yard faces the community park, and the back of the house faces woods, making for a relaxing experience.  Key property features include a dog-friendly environment, one designated parking spot with ample additional parking and overflow parking near the house, and you are in close proximity to a host of places such as restaurants, department stores, and several renowned educational institutions. This home is near both Dunn Loring and Idylwood Parks, the popular W&OD Trail, and Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts, as well as being strategically located between Dunn Loring and Tysons Metro stations.  Dulles and National Airports, along with Inova Fairfax Hospital are easy to reach as well.  Within the home, you'll find the beautifully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, freshly refinished living and dining room hardwoods (Aug 29, 2024), new windows, newly installed recreation room carpet, and more allowing for a smooth and well-organized domestic experience.   The recreation room doors open to a large, fenced back yard with a storage shed.  The laundry room contains a full-size washer and dryer, folding table, and shelves.  As part of your rent, you'll also benefit from complimentary garbage and recycling service, and yard maintenance to ensure your home remains pristine. The front yard maintenance is full service. The back yard maintenance consists of grass cutting and leaf removal, provided you leave the gate open for entry on those days. Fairfax County Public Schools are award-winning, and this property is in the Marshall HS tier, with all schools nearby.  There are several swimming pools nearby who accept applications when openings are available.  Pets are approved on a case-by-case basis.  Applications are available online, and are processed Mon-Fri between 9A-4P with a maximum of 2 qualifying incomes.  The Security Deposit equals one month’s rent.  The pet deposit is $650.  No more than 3 unrelated residents.  No Smoking.  The property is available for a minimum lease of 12 months and a maximum 35 months, with immediate occupancy available with proper qualifications.  Please ask your REALTOR® to schedule an appointment for you to see this wonderful property for yourself and embark on a new chapter in delightful Vienna, VA. Your new home awaits!

PublicRemarks: This spacious and well-maintained three-level townhouse offers comfortable living in a prime Centreville location. Nestled in the desirable Green Trails community and backing to open common area this beautiful home boasts 3 bedrooms, each with their own private baths, and loads of upgrades! A tailored exterior with covered entry, 2-assigned parking spaces, sundeck, patio, fenced yard, bright open floor plan, hardwood floors on all 3 levels, decorative moldings, gas fireplace, and an upgraded kitchen and renovated baths create instant appeal! The gourmet kitchen is sure to please with gleaming granite countertops, a bay window, breakfast bar, and quality stainless steel appliances. The dining room features chair rail and a contemporary chandelier adding refined style. The light filled living room has sliding glass doors granting access to the deck that overlooks common area beyond and steps descending to the paver patio and fenced backyard, perfect for entertaining and simple relaxation. A powder room with a pedestal sink rounds out the main level. Upstairs you’ll find two generously sized bedrooms, each with hardwood flooring, ample closet space, and their own private beautifully renovated baths. The lower level family room invites you to relax and unwind in front of a cozy gas fireplace. PublicRemarks: Welcome to Gateway Commons in Stone Ridge, Loudoun County, VA—a beautifully master-planned community offering a vibrant yet easy-going suburban lifestyle. This stunning, North East-facing Essex model end-unit townhouse by award-winning Van Metre is the epitome of modern living, offering unique privacy with its serene pond-facing location. The brick-front, three-level home spans over 2,600 square feet, featuring 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a two-car garage. As you enter the home, the lower level welcomes you with a spacious recreation room that opens to the backyard. The main level is perfect for entertaining, with a formal dining area, a living room with a cozy fireplace, and a gourmet kitchen outfitted with stainless steel appliances and upgraded cabinets. The kitchen also features a breakfast nook that leads to a custom rear deck, ideal for outdoor dining with peaceful pond views. Upstairs, the luxurious primary bedroom offers trey ceilings, a walk-in closet, and a master bath with dual vanities. Two additional spacious bedrooms, a linen closet, and a convenient laundry room complete the upper level. This home is wired for CAT 7 cable and boasts hardwood flooring throughout. Conveniently located near Aldie Shopping Center, Dulles Landing Shopping Center, South Riding Center, Stone Springs Hospital, and various retail centers, this property is also situated in a highly regarded school district. You'll be within walking distance of the Stone Ridge Village Center, where you can enjoy shops, restaurants, and more. Residents have access to multiple pools, a clubhouse, tennis courts, a fitness center, miles of walking trails, and a host of community events. Onsite schools, daycare centers, and easy access to major thoroughfares like Routes 50 and 28 make this location incredibly convenient—just under 20 minutes from Dulles Airport, with the Blue Ridge Mountains on the horizon. Gateway Commons truly is the gateway to an energetic, suburban lifestyle. Please note: This home is owner-occupied. Showings are by confirmed appointment only. Requirements :  - Credit score of 700 + - Income at least 2.5 X the rent - No bankruptcy or eviction records Hurry… you don't want to miss this beautiful home!

PublicRemarks: Discover Unit 10 at 2700 Dartmouth Rd, a charming two-bedroom, one-bathroom condo in the highly desirable Seminary Walk community. This spacious 879 sq ft home offers an exceptional living experience with features like in-unit laundry, a delightful deck perfect for unwinding, and generously sized rooms bathed in natural light. Meticulously cared for, this unit boasts a thoughtful layout designed for easy living with updated floors and appliances. Enjoy wide plank floors throughout, stainless steel kitchen appliances, and a dining area. BONUS: On-site gym, additional storage closet in basement, water, sewer, and gas included in rent. Convenient, tranquil, and low-maintenance. Seminary Walk places you just 1.3 miles from the King Street Metro station, with convenient transportation options along Duke Street. You're also only a mile away from Alexandria Commons, less than two miles from Eisenhower Shopping Center, and less than two miles from Bradlee Shopping Center - all bustling areas to enjoy shopping and dining. For those who love gourmet grocery shopping, Whole Foods and Wegmans are just a short distance away. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate being right across the street from Angel Park and within a 10-15 minute drive of historic Ft. Ward Historic Park, Mt. Vernon, and Huntley Meadows Nature Preserve. This prime location provides easy access to major roads like King St, Duke St, I-495, I-395, as well as VRE, Amtrak, and key public transit routes. A scenic 20-minute drive through Alexandria's charming neighborhoods takes you to the vibrant heart of downtown D.C. However, with the historic charm of Old Town Alexandria and its waterfront just minutes away, you'll find everything you need close to home. Polling location and zoned elementary school is recently re-built Douglas MacArthur Elementary School. This is your gateway to an elevated lifestyle in a thriving community full of convenience and opportunity.

AgentRemarks: ** Beautiful renovated home***Furniture if included will be $500/month additional to the rent price.  Solid brick home on private lot surrounded on 3 sides by common HOA treed, natural property. Public water. 4 wood burning fireplaces. Hardwood, 6 bedrooms, 4.5 baths. High-end gourmet kitchen. Sunroom w/heated floor. 3-car garage w/space for woodworking. Plenty of additional driveway parking. DETAILS: kitchen boasts professional grade appliances and coffee/wet bar. Meticulously remodeled to maintain the integrity of the home, while providing the highest end custom cabinets, and luxurious granite countertops, that flow seamlessly up the entire backsplash. Raised panel custom cabinetry includes details such as custom spice drawer, pull out dish drawers, self-closing drawers. Appliances include: Sub-zero refrigerator, 6-burner, professional-grade Thermador gas range w/ electric oven/convection oven with slide out racks, GE profile microwave/convection oven combination, and a Thermador dishwasher. Kitchen extends to family room w/ matwet bar/coffee bar features additional custom cabinetry, large bar sink, built-in Bosch European coffee maker that serves coffees, expresso, cappuccino and lattes, a U-Line beverage refrigerator and second full-size Bosch D/W. **. DINING ROOM features a breakfast bar for a quick snack. The living space continues into the family room with expansive built-ins, a magnificent window overlooking wooded property substantial fireplace w/ sitting hearth where the family can relax, roast marshmallows, and enjoy the warmth of a fire. From the family room, French double doors swing wide to a completely remodeled 4 season sunroom with Anders windows on three sides that take in the serene beauty of the backyard, and bridle path that runs along the back lot line. The sunroom is heated with radiant heated tile floor. From the sunroom, you can wonder outside to the new maintenance free composite deck and enjoy the afternoon sun or a relaxing morning with a hot drink. Continue down the stairs to the new flagstone patio just out from the walk out family room in basement. A great outdoor space for cookouts and relaxing - day or night. ** Main level PRIMARY BDRM w/black & white marble seated shower, whirlpool tub and double sinks. Separate dressing area with vanity. ** Gather in the LIVING ROOM in front of 1 of 4 wood burning fireplaces with white mantle and marble surround. , Just down the hall is the main-level Primary Bedroom Suite complete with sitting area, dressing area and spa bath that was completely redesigned with marble tile, Thomasville vanities with soft close drawers, jetted tub, and large walk in shower with frameless glass door, seat and strong pressure rain water shower head. Continue UPSTAIRS to 4 spacious bedrooms & 2 full baths that have been completely remodeled. On your way up the stairs, you will notice another imported crystal chandelier. The new bathrooms have shaker vanities with ample storage and self-closing drawers. Both bathrooms have two integrated sinks each with quartz countertops. The new bathrooms are accompanied by all new tile, hardware and toilets, fans, lights. One bath includes a tub with shower, and the Jack/Jill bath has a walk-in shower with magnificent tile work, ** Please apply through RentSpree application attached and we will forward all applications immediately to owner.

PublicRemarks: Brand new Stanley Martin townhome-style garage condo in Ashburn less than one mile to the Silver Line Metro Station! Discover this Jaw Dropping, low-maintenance condo; fully equipped for your convenience and comfort. Drenched in natural light, it boasts a 1-car rear-load garage with storage areas for your sports equipment, tools, and other items. Say goodbye to inclement weather hassles and hello to quick and easy entrances! As you step inside, you'll be greeted by an inviting living room that promotes mingling and enjoyable moments with friends & loved ones. The breakfast area and open-concept kitchen complement the space surrounding you! Upstairs, you'll find your serene escape in the large owner's suite, complete with an attached private bathroom and two walk-in closets that provide ample space for all your belongings. An additional guest bedroom and a cozy lounge room complete the upper level. Plus, with a stackable laundry installed in a hallway closet, your daily chores can remain a breeze. This condo is a lovely balance of style, functionality, and simplicity! The photos shown are from a similar home. Contact us to schedule a tour. Ashburn Station is within 1 mile of the Silver Line Metro in Northern Virginia. This neighborhood offers a more than convenient location, close to major commuting routes and some of the area's largest employers. Enjoy amenities dispersed throughout this new neighborhood including a gaming lawn, 2 workout stations, a playground, and multiple community parks featuring greenspace, firepit, grilling station, and outdoor seating. This location is a short stroll or quick drive to the many shopping, dining, and entertainment options throughout central Loudoun County. Ashburn Station is an amazing choice for residents who want to work and play close to home. Call us today! $3350/Month

PublicRemarks: Beautifully updated townhome located in The Timbers community with modern finishes and fixtures. This property is located in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood, and is a very convenient drive from Fort Belvoir. The main level layout is open, airy, and inviting - perfect for entertaining guests and spending quality time with family. The living room area and adjoining dining space are ideal for hosting gatherings. Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a large bay window with an area that can be used as a window seat to sit and relax or as a perfect spot for placing potted plants. On the second level, there are three bedrooms, including the primary bedroom with its own private full bath and there is an additional full bath in the hall. All bathrooms have been completely updated with new vanities, lighting, showers, toilets, and tile! The entire townhouse has been repainted in modern neutral colors, and the basement flooring has also been updated. On the basement level, you'll find a half bath, access to the garage, and a multi-purpose area with a walkout sliding door. The back deck has stairs conveniently connecting the upper and lower levels. This home has a one-car garage, a driveway, and an additional parking pass to park in the neighborhood parking spots. Great location- Easy access to excellent schools, shopping, dining options, recreational facilities, public transportation, and major highways.

AgentRemarks: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of Leesburg! This well maintained 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath townhome offers a perfect blend of modern convenience and suburban tranquility. Nestled in a private, area this home provides an ideal setting for comfortable living and effortless entertaining. Key Features: Spacious Living: With four generously sized bedrooms, including a large master suite, there’s plenty of room for everyone. The 2.5 baths are beautifully appointed, ensuring convenience and comfort. Modern Amenities: The well-kept interior boasts a contemporary design with high-quality finishes, an open-concept kitchen, and ample storage. Community Charm: Located in a private, serene neighborhood, this townhome offers a safe and peaceful environment. The community is known for its friendly atmosphere and well-maintained surroundings, making it perfect for families and professionals alike. The neighborhood also features beautifully landscaped common areas, perfect for a morning jog or an evening stroll. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this stunning townhome your own. Experience the best of Leesburg living with a home that combines comfort, style, and a fantastic location. Contact us today to schedule a private tour and see for yourself what makes this property so special!

PublicRemarks: This first-floor apartment at 43176 Tall Pines Court, Suite 1, offers a unique combination of comfort and convenience in a highly sought-after Ashburn, VA location. Part of the prestigious Toll Brothers' Mansion Collection, this apartment boasts spacious, well-designed rooms, with over 1,100 square feet of living space. The apartment features a large, sunlit living room perfect for relaxation or entertaining, and an adjacent dining area that seamlessly connects to a generously sized kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances and ample counter space, making it ideal for those who enjoy cooking or need space for meal preparation. The bedroom area, though open without a door, offers a sense of privacy and tranquility, enhanced by a walk-in closet for added storage and organization..This is a true one-bedroom apartment, offering more space and versatility than a studio. The bedroom is complemented by a full bathroom, ensuring convenience and comfort. A small nook within the apartment is perfect for a home office or study area, making it an excellent choice for those who work from home and need a quiet, dedicated workspace. Additional amenities include a full-size washer and dryer within the unit, adding to the convenience of daily living. The apartment comes with one off-street parking space, ensuring easy access and security for your vehicle. The owners take care of all utilities, including high-speed internet access, allowing tenants to enjoy a hassle-free living experience. This apartment is perfect for someone seeking a spacious, comfortable, and well-located home with all the necessary amenities included.

PublicRemarks: Discover the charm of this beautifully renovated home, perfectly situated on a coveted private corner lot in the heart of Chantilly. This expansive 4 bedroom, 4.5 bath single-family delivers over 4,200 square feet on 3 finished levels, providing ample space for your lifestyle needs. A tailored brick and siding exterior, an oversized concrete driveway and 2-car garage, and fenced yard with patio surrounded by majestic trees create instant outdoor appeal. ****** Inside, an open floor plan, high ceilings, decorative moldings, a soft neutral designer color palette, stylish new wide plank flooring and plush new carpet, chic upgraded lighting, and an abundance of windows that fill the space with natural light are just a few features that make this home special. An upgraded kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances, upgraded baths, a luxurious owner’s suite, generously sized bedrooms each with ensuite baths, and a fully finished lower level with a recreation room, media room and den with attached bath creates an inviting ambiance and unparalleled convenience. ****** Rich wide plank flooring greets you in the foyer and flows into the formal living room where a bay window fills the space with light, steps away, the formal dining room is accented by a shimmering chandelier adding refined style. The spacious family room with walls of windows beckons you to relax and unwind in front of a cozy gas fireplace serving as the focal point of the room. The gourmet kitchen is a feast for the eyes with gleaming granite countertops, an abundance of 42” cabinetry, center island, a pantry, planning desk, and new stainless steel appliances including a gas range. The adjoining breakfast room with a graceful bow of windows is the ideal spot for daily dining, while a glass door to the patio and the open atmosphere facilitates entertaining. A powder room and laundry room compliment the main level. ****** Upstairs, the gracious owner’s suite boasts a soaring cathedral ceiling with display ledge and contemporary lighted ceiling fan, plush new carpet, a walk-in closet, and a sitting are in front of a graceful bow of windows. The ensuite bath features dual granite topped vanities, sleek lighting and fixtures, a water closet, soaking tub and glass enclosed shower, the finest in personal pampering. Down the three light filled bedrooms, each new carpet enjoys access to either a well-appointed private or dual entry bath with granite topped vanities. ****** The walkup lower level with plush carpet and recessed lighting is sure to be a popular destination for family and friends and features an expansive recreation room, a media room, and a den/5th bedroom that enjoys private access to the 4th full bath, making it an excellent guest suite. ****** Nestled in a peaceful setting in the heart of a thriving community with access to top-notch schools. Located in the legal subdivision of Rockland Village, you'll enjoy a welcoming community and convenient access to local amenities. Don't miss out on this incredible rental opportunity. Get ready to move into your dream home!

PublicRemarks: LEESBURG -  3BR/4.5BA Four-Level Brick Townhouse with Garage This gorgeous four-level townhouse in Woodlands features a brick exterior, large windows, and spacious rooms throughout. The main entry on the lower level opens to a generous family room and a full bathroom. Head up to the main level, where you'll find a bright and airy living room with hardwood floors, a cozy fireplace, and sliding doors to a balcony. The large open-concept kitchen boasts an island/breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances; a dining area, and convenient half bath complete this level. The upper level offers three bedrooms, including a primary suite with an ensuite bathroom. You'll also find a hall bath and a laundry area on this floor. The top floor features a versatile loft space that can be used as an office, playroom, or workout area, with an additional full bath. French doors lead to a spacious rooftop terrace. Don’t forget the attached two-car garage! This home offers easy access to commuter routes, and with Wegmans, shopping, dining, and a movie theater at the Village at Leesburg just under a mile away, convenience is at your doorstep!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 10899 Woodland Falls Drive, Great Falls, VA Experience unparalleled luxury in this fully renovated masterpiece, featuring over $350,000 in premium upgrades. Nestled in a tranquil cul-de-sac on a sprawling 2.7-acre lot, this property offers exceptional privacy, a serene stream, and breathtaking forest views. Key Features: - Living Space: 6,000 sq ft of opulent living space, 7 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms, with 9-foot ceilings and exquisite new hardwood floors throughout. - Master Suite: An expansive retreat, bathed in natural light with picturesque views, providing a sanctuary of comfort and elegance. - Gourmet Kitchen: A chef's dream with state-of-the-art KitchenAid appliances, quartz countertops, and custom cabinetry ($48,000). - Bathrooms: The luxuriously redesigned master bathroom ($30,000), a new en-suite bedroom on the main level ($20,000), all other bathrooms fully renovated in 2023, and an additional new half bath ($2,000). - Basement: This basement has been enhanced with a new family room addition ($5,000) and a chic kitchenette ($15,000), perfect for entertaining or guest accommodations. - Outdoor Living: A two-level deck and walkway ($30,000), beautifully landscaped with extensive tree removal ($15,000), create an outdoor oasis. - Custom Features: Tailored closets including a new master walk-in ($32,000), raised family room flooring ($10,000), and new epoxy garage floor paint ($2,500). - Modern Updates: New roof and gutters ($26,000), fresh paint throughout ($21,000), new light fixtures ($12,000), and a new water heater ($2,500). - Entertainment: Home theatre recliners ($5,000) for a cinematic experience. This home is located in the prestigious Langley High School District and exemplifies luxury living. From its elegant design to its tranquil surroundings, 10899 Woodland Falls Drive epitomizes sophistication and comfort. Discover this colonial gem's perfect blend of style, convenience, and serenity.

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this gorgeous two-level townhome built by Miller & Smith, featuring four bedrooms, an office, and two and a half bathrooms. Boasting a two-car garage, this townhome is perfect for those seeking a single-family home experience. The property has been fully upgraded, with carpeted bedrooms, and upgraded hardwood floors on the main level. The main level also features hardwood stairs and an upper loft, an updated mudroom with new tile flooring, custom-built storage cabinets, high ceilings, and custom appointments throughout.  The open floor plan includes a formal dining room and a main library/office. The gourmet kitchen showcases new quartz countertops, a large center island, a breakfast bar, and stainless-steel appliances, including a refrigerator and cooktop. You can relax in the family room off the kitchen, which has custom-built cabinetry and a cozy gas fireplace.  On the spacious upper level, you'll find a large open loft that can be used as an office or another family room/den area, four bedrooms, and two full bathrooms. The lovely master suite has a large walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom with separate granite vanities, a separate shower, and a soaking tub.  Enjoy the beautifully landscaped fenced-in backyard with a custom-designed stone patio that offers a perfect escape after a long day. Brambleton offers many amenities, including pools, a clubhouse, tennis courts, tot lots, and miles of walking/jogging trails. The townhome is conveniently located only minutes from the new Silver Line Metro and Brambleton Town Center.

If their application is declined, their security deposit will be refunded by Paylease within 5 - 7 business days. Lease must be 12 months minimum. AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Sorry, no pets. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Bright & Beautiful End Unit- Great Location & Schools!!  You'll love this light and bright end of row townhouse's gleaming hardwood floors, designer paint, plus all of the new LED light fixtures and high end finishes.  The classic kitchen boasts real wood cabinets, a pantry, new fixtures, and table space by the bay window; the down/up blinds make this the perfect morning coffee spot.  The open concept living/dining area enjoy lots of natural light from the tall windows overlooking the quiet community.   The spacious primary suite extends the length of the house, has ample closet space, and boasts a brand new bath with stall shower.  The two generously sized guest bedrooms share a full sized fully renovated hall bath.   Downstairs, there is a huge walkout level rec-room with more recessed lights, a fireplace, and a window wall that opens to a full sized, fully fenced patio.   An updated half bath and laundry/storage room with newer washer and dryer complete the first floor.   This quiet community, located on a dead end residential street with plenty of guest parking, comes with one assigned space, commuter bus stops, a sports court, ball field, and paths that lead to stunning lake royal park.  With a half mile, you can walk to Target, Burke Center Rail Station & Farmer's Market, Bunnyman Breweing or Bowl America.  Close to GMU & City of Fairfax; close to 495,  66, 123  for a quick commute in any direction.

PublicRemarks: Charming Fully Furnished Townhome in the Heart of Alexandria’s Wakefield Neighborhood! Discover your new home at 37 S Hudson St, a beautifully updated semi-detached townhome that combines comfort and style in the desirable Wakefield community. Perfectly located just off Duke Street, this property is an ideal haven for anyone seeking a modern living experience with all the conveniences at their fingertips! Key Features: 1) Spacious & Pet-Friendly: Enjoy the luxury of a huge, fully fenced backyard—perfect for pets to roam free! A convenient pet door makes it easy for furry friends to come and go. 2) Stylish Open Concept Living: The heart of the home is a stunning, remodeled kitchen that features gleaming stainless steel appliances, chic white shaker-style cabinetry, and ample space for cooking and entertaining. 3) Bright & Inviting Spaces: Sip your morning coffee in the sun-drenched living room, which seamlessly flows into the dining area—ideal for hosting friends and family. 4) Comfortable Bedrooms: Upstairs, you’ll find two generously sized bedrooms that offer a peaceful retreat, along with a fully updated bathroom for your convenience. 5) Bonus Finished Basement: The beautifully finished basement features a full bathroom, laundry room, and a cozy office nook—perfect for remote work or study. There's even room for an additional bed, making it a versatile space for guests or family. 6) Prime Location: Just a 14-minute drive to the scenic waterfront of Old Town Alexandria and a short 10-minute walk to Port City Brewing Company, you’ll be surrounded by vibrant dining and entertainment options. This fully furnished gem offers the perfect blend of modern amenities and cozy charm—don’t miss your chance to call it home! Schedule a viewing today and experience all that 37 S Hudson St has to offer!

AgentRemarks: Welcome to this meticulously maintained gorgeous 3 finished level Colonial with over 5458 finished square feet in the sought after Carrington community! This luxurious 5-bedroom, 4.5-bath home has a grand, two-story foyer that features an elegant staircase leading to the second level. The main level offers a spacious high ceiling family room with a gas fireplace that leads to a private deck, a lovely sunroom, a dedicated office room, a formal dining room and a gourmet kitchen with breakfast area and an oversized two-story window. This main level has newly finished hardwood floors and porcelain tile flooring. The kitchen, office and dining rooms boast magnificent bay windows. The upper-level features four generously sized bedrooms all with new carpet and three bathrooms. The large owner’s suite has walk-in closets, and a master bathroom with dual vanities, a jacuzzi tub and a separate shower. The fully finished lower level offers a bedroom with a full bathroom, a large open area that can be used for multiple living spaces, and two storage rooms. It also has brand new AC system, and washer and drier, all new carpets through second floor, andfresh paint in the first and second floors. Almost all windows will be changed to brand-new Pella windows in August. With a great school pyramid of Spring Hill Elementary, Cooper Middle and Langley High School, this house is in an ideal location, with easy access to Dulles Toll Road, I-495, 15 mins to DC and less than a mile to Spring Hill Metro. Conveniently located and in close proximity to Tysons Mall, Tysons Galleria, Wolf trap National Park and with multiple shopping and dining options, the home is ready to just move in and enjoy! Applicant with high credit score, good rental history, Copy of ID! 2 Latest Pay Stubs . $500 monthly fee is addition to the rent covers management, Gutter cleaning, yearly maintenance of the sprinkler system, and once a year mulching and trees and shrubs pruning, lawn care and more .The floor plan provided is the actual flipped layout of the house. Please remove your shoes when entering the house.

This beautiful brick front single-family home features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a two-car garage, all situated on a quiet cul-de-sac. Upon entry, a soaring foyer welcomes guests to the sophisticated living areas. The open floor plan boasts sparkling hardwood floors throughout the main level. The formal living and dining room combination is perfect for accommodating large family gatherings. The main level also includes a convenient office, ideal for working from home. The spacious kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring stainless steel appliances, ample cabinets, recessed lighting, a desk, a kitchen island, a breakfast bar, a pantry, an oversized breakfast nook, and walk-out access to the backyard. A separate laundry room is conveniently located off the kitchen. The family room offers a wall of windows, a gas fireplace, a ceiling fan, and a vaulted ceiling. Upstairs, the huge primary bedroom suite features a tray ceiling, a walk-in closet, and a private luxury bath with double vanities, a separate tub, and a shower. The secondary bedrooms provide plenty of room for sleep, storage, or play. The large finished lower level offers a family-sized recreation room, a full bath, and walk-up access to the backyard. The fenced backyard offers plenty of privacy with natural trees. Conveniently located near Route 28, Route 50, Dulles Toll Road, I-66, shops, and restaurants, this home is just a short drive to Dulles Airport and less than 3 miles from the Metro. Please note, no pets allowed. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exquisite home yours!

This home is ideal for anyone looking to be part of a welcoming neighborhood while enjoying the benefits of modern amenities and proximity to urban centers. PublicRemarks: Ready to move in! Huge end unit TH in West Springfield featuring 3 roomy size bedrooms and 2 baths on upper level, basement has another full bath and a large rec room as another bedroom. Enjoy beautiful wood view around from upper and lower decks. Wonderful location/community. Quiet street.  Assigned 2 parking in front of the end unit.

End unit townhouse, three levels with a 2-car garage and a scenic pond view! Features 3 full bathrooms and 1 half bath. Recently updated with a new HVAC system last year and new engineered hardwood flooring throughout all levels (photos of bedrooms have not been updated yet). The unit includes 2 primary bedroom suites, each with their own full bath. The open floor plan includes a modern kitchen that flows into the dining and living room areas, perfect for both everyday living and entertaining. There is a balcony off the kitchen. The first floor can be accessed from the front entrance and offers a versatile space that can serve as an additional living room, den, or office, with direct access to the garage. Community amenities include tennis courts, pool, and proximity to shopping and restaurants. A non-refundable application fee is required. Please contact the agent for rental application and tenant screening details. Currently occupied by tenants, the property will be professionally cleaned before the next tenant moves in. Available starting September 1st, 2023.

PublicRemarks: Step into comfort and convenience with this delightful rental property featuring ample living space spread across multiple levels. On the upper level, you'll find two generously sized bedrooms sharing a luxurious Jack and Jill bathroom, complete with a separate tub and shower for added convenience and comfort. Plus, the kitchen comes equipped with a stainless steel fridge, adding a touch of modern elegance to the already impressive features. The main floor boasts a welcoming ambiance with a convenient half bathroom, perfect for guests and day-to-day use. Downstairs, discover even more versatility with an additional half bathroom, plus bonus space ideal for a home office, additional living area, or bonus room. Laundry day is a breeze thanks to the dedicated laundry room equipped with a washer, dryer, and wash sink, making chores a hassle-free experience. This home offers the perfect blend of functionality and comfort, making it an ideal choice for renters seeking convenience and space. Contact us today to schedule a tour and make this your new home sweet home!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 for the 1st pet and $15 for the 2nd pet. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home! This top floor 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo PLUS den is stunning, with high ceilings and an abundance of natural lighting. Gorgeous wood floors greet you at the front door and lead you into the combined living and dining rooms, perfect for entertaining family and friends. The living room features vaulted ceilings, track lighting, and a wood burning fireplace you’ll enjoy in these cooler months! The open kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a handsome stone tile backsplash. Down the hall, the spacious primary bedroom boasts large windows, flooding the room with natural light. Inside the elegant en suite bathroom, you’ll find a wide double sink vanity with granite countertops, a walk-in shower with stylish tilework, and a large walk-in closet with a custom closet system. The light-filled den is a fantastic addition and could be an ideal home office, exercise room, or nursery and has a massive walk-in storage closet for your convenience. On the other side of the unit, the second bathroom is sizable and bright with two closets. The second full bathroom includes modern fixtures and a privacy door for the shower. This condo also features a large in-unit laundry room with a full size washer dryer and multiple large closets. One garage parking space #546 and one visitor pass. Community amenities are abundant and include an outdoor pool, hot tub, sauna, fitness center, party room, dog park, basketball court, grilling & picnic areas, playground, and car washing station. The daily shuttle to the Pentagon City Metro makes this a commuter’s dream (M-F every half hour from 6:30-9:30am and 4:30-7:30pm)! Minutes to The Pentagon, Mark Center, Amazon HQ2, The Village at Shirlington, Pentagon City, Old Town Alexandria, and Downtown DC. Enjoy local trails at Fort Ward Park and Barcroft Park. One mile from the Bradlee Center and Bailey's Crossroads and all your shopping needs: Target, HomeGoods, World Market, CVS, TJMax, Burlington Coat Factory, Harris Teeter, Fresh Market, Starbucks, the new Silver Diner, Xsport, and OrangeTheory. Quick access to I-395, Van Dorn St, Rte 7, Braddock Rd, Seminary Rd, I-495, and I-66 and more! Community is welcoming, social, and VERY pet friendly!

PublicRemarks: Beautifully updated 2 level condo that lives like a townhouse in a fabulous location!! The bright open floorplan welcomes you when you enter the unit. An expanded, kitchen space has been opened up for more room.  Luxurious flooring in a contemporary shade graces the living level which includes a gas fireplace with marble enhanced mantle and is surrounded by built-ins to show off your book collection or personal momentous. A spacious half bath, dining space and pantry complete the main level. There is a spacious deck off the living space. Upstairs you will find a super-spacious luxurious primary bedroom that features a huge walk-in closet. The primary bath will be your spa-like getaway, features dual sinks, soaking tub and separate tiled shower. An additional bedroom, a full bath and laundry space with washer/dryer complete the upper level. This condo conveys with 1 garage parking space and 2 guest parking passes! The location can't be beat! Across the street from Dunn Loring Metro and all the shopping/dining experiences you could want including a huge Harris Teeter, H-Mart, Lidl, for all your grocery needs. The Mosaic District is within walking distance and features the Angelika Theatre, local and national stores including a huge Target, lots of great restaurants too. Other great local restaurants including Trio Grill, Open Road and many more. Quick access to local routes – I495 and I66 for commuting and traveling. You'll love living in this spacious condo and do not want to miss this opportunity!

PublicRemarks: BUILDING A HOME? MOVING TO VIRGINIA? RELOCATING? RESTORATION PROJECT? MAKE YOUR MOVE EASY!! FULLY FURNISHED 2 MONTHS SHORT TERM RENTAL in ASHBURN!!  Absolutely Stunning & an incredible home located in the most coveted neighborhood of Ashburn-Preserve at Goose Creek! This also falls under the area's top notch schools! Enjoy the most beautiful sunrises & sunsets overlooking the blue ridge mountains! The home is bustling with lovely upgrades & elegant furniture throughout. Enter this beautiful sun lit space with modern open floor plan & tasteful interior furnishings, Formal living, formal dining, Office space on main, Family room with gas fireplace, tv 75"  with 5.1 Samsung sound bar surround sound, hardwood floors throughout on main, upgraded gourmet kitchen hosting a breathtaking custom island, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances & so much more! Walk up into upper level with separate controlled HVAC. Nest Thermostat all throughout! Every br on this level has its own walk in closet & Sealy Posture pedic mattress in all rooms! Fan is installed in every room. Master is installed with 65" tv with Polk 2.1 sound bar for your quiet movie nights! Spa like tub with separate glass stand in shower, his/her separate walking in closets, Lots of space, designer touches, recessed lights, a tesla charger, & the list continues! PublicRemarks: WOW!!! Stop scrolling NOW!  This gorgeous condo home is only $2975/MONTH + ALL UTILITIES + 1 COVERED PARKING SPACE + YES TO DOGS/CATS!!!  Welcome home to Place One Condominiums.   Spacious, bright, and CLEAN corner 2-Bedroom + 1 Den/Flex/3rd bed room,  3-bathroom  condo home features an inviting open floor plan and includes all utilities & 1 garage parking space for your convenience. This is the largest floor plan unit in this condo complex!  Over 1400 sq ft!  FRESHLY PAINTED THROUGHOUT!  NEW BEDROOM CARPETING in versatile greige color fits every decor style.  Engineered hardwood flooring accents the light-filled Living/Dining room. Step onto the expansive balcony that overlooks the award-winning landscaped grounds, inviting pool deck area as well as treetop views - super private.   Large Kitchen has counter and cabinet space galore and a pantry.   Kitchen features electric cooking with updated appliances.  The Primary Bedroom suite offers a walk-in closet, a 2nd closet, and an attached Primary Full Bathroom. The 2nd Bedroom with attached Full Bathroom, is generously sized, boasting a large closet and abundant natural light via large window wall,   Den/Flex Room/3rd Bedroom includes built-in shelving and attached Half Bathroom and is directly off the large Living Room/Dining Room combination space.   A stacked washer/dryer unit and additional storage room completes this well-designed layout.    Place One Condominium includes an array of amenities, 24-hour front desk concierge and security, an outdoor swimming pool,  picnic area with grills, sauna, fitness center, community room with various activities, fully-fenced dog park, shuffleboard court, tennis/pickleball courts, plus and award-winning landscaped grounds.   LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!!   Nearby parks featuring ample grassy areas, playgrounds, bike paths, and running trails are just outside the building.   Retail, Food Shopping, Recreation,  schools, and services,  and access to main NoVA commuter routes all just minutes down the street or via access from DASH, WMATA busses or close-by King Street or Van Dorn Metro stations.   Place One is approx. 10 miles into DC, approx 15 miles to Fort Belvoir, Tysons Corner, and National Harbor, and approx a 60 minute drive to many Virginia wineries and breweries.     Rental terms: Lease min. 12 months - 24 months w/option to renew; min. annual combined household income of $150,000/year to qualify; max. 2 combined incomes to qualify; Min credit score is 680; Max. capacity is 4 humans; 1 underground parking space conveys. YES Pets; Cats and dogs only; breed, weight restrictions; $350 refundable pet deposit per pet + $25 pet monthly rent; NO Smoking of any kind permitted. Apply online via RentRisk link. $65 non-refundable application fee per adult 18 yo+ to reside in the rental home.  Local landlord self-managing the property. Landlord reserves the right to final decision on any application. Book all showings online; all showings done by appointment or contact agent for showing appointments or questions.    It's effortless living at Place One!  Welcome home!

PublicRemarks: Nestled on a picturesque .50-acre lot on one of Vienna's most beautiful streets, this enchanting custom craftsman-style home offers a superb location just minutes from Vienna shopping centers, Tysons Corner, the W&OD Trail, and fresh markets. The charming, quiet neighborhood is perfect for those seeking tranquility. As you approach the home, the flickering gas light in the front yard and the meticulously maintained front garden provide a sense of privacy and lead you to the inviting front porch. Inside, you'll find four levels of luxury, featuring huge windows, unique nooks and crannies, angled turrets, and exquisite details throughout. The foyer opens to a stunning curved staircase, an octagon living room with a gas fireplace, and a formal dining room. The main level boasts a primary suite with a walk-in closet and a grand bathroom complete with a soaking tub and shower. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring a SubZero refrigerator, a custom pull-out spice rack, a large island, and a morning area that opens to a bright great room with cathedral ceilings, skylights, a wood fireplace, a bar area with plumbing for a sink, and an arched window wall. Sliding doors from the kitchen lead to a huge deck, perfect for outdoor dining, entertainment, and relaxation, including a spa deck with a hot tub overlooking the garden, tall trees, flagstone walkways, and a patio with a fountain and outdoor lighting. The upper level features a second primary suite with a walk-in closet and a recently renovated grand bath with a Jacuzzi and steam shower. Additionally, there are two bedrooms, one with a balcony and a spiral staircase leading to the loft level, perfect for an artist's studio, playroom, or den. The lower level offers two outdoor entrances, a rec room, exercise area, den, office, media lounge with a barrel-vault ceiling wine cellar, a large workshop room, and ample storage. Built-in speakers are available in the living room, dining room, family room, and outdoors, providing a seamless audio experience throughout the home. 6-12 Month Rental Term.
