PublicRemarks: Step into luxury with this beautifully updated, model-condition home located in the highly sought-after Lake Ridge community. Situated on a prime cul-de-sac lot, this stunning property offers an abundance of light, space, and privacy, making it a must-see for anyone seeking the perfect blend of modern living and serene surroundings. As you enter, you'll be greeted by an expansive and open floor plan that effortlessly flows from room to room. The 2-story family room is a showstopper, filled with natural light and providing a warm, inviting atmosphere for both relaxation and entertaining. The heart of the home, the updated kitchen, is a chef's dream. Featuring modern finishes and an open layout, it's perfect for cooking up a feast while staying connected with guests. Step outside onto the deck to enjoy the fresh air and take in the view of your huge, fully fenced yard, surrounded by mature trees for ultimate privacy. Upstairs, the master suite is a true retreat, complete with a private full bath for your comfort and convenience. An additional full bathroom and a second bedroom are also located on this level, providing ample space for family or guests. The main level features another bedroom with an adjacent full bath, offering flexibility for one-level living or a perfect space for guests. The lower level is fully finished, offering a versatile recreation room (projector screen and projector including), a dedicated office space, and a bonus room, gym, or additional guest room. This home has been meticulously updated throughout, ensuring you can move right in without lifting a finger. With its light-filled interiors, spacious layout, and prime location, this property is truly a gem in Lake Ridge. Don’t miss your chance to call this incredible house your home!

Gourmet Kitchen is equipped with Quartz Countertops and Bosch Stainless Steel Appliances. Kitchen also has a massive Kitchen Island that is 13'. You'll love the beautiful tree-lined streets and sidewalks in the amenity-rich, resort-style community of Potomac Shores. The home boasts a charming front porch, a deck off the family room, and a fenced backyard – ideal for outdoor living. The tandem car garage is perfect for hobbyists or those with extra vehicles. With over 2,900 finished square feet, this home includes four bedrooms, 3 1/2 baths, a finished walk-up basement, and new hard-surface flooring on the main and lower levels. Cozy up by the gas fireplace or enjoy the modern conveniences of an interior sound system, fire suppression system, Low-E windows, and rough-in plumbing for a future lower-level bar. AgentRemarks: Note:  All Photo's are from prior listing .  Tenant Occupied. Surpassing all expectations, welcome to 17723 White Campion Way. This Potomac Shores residence is a flawless masterpiece, meticulously designed in every aspect. The rarely available Continental Model, constructed in 2022, sets the standard for perfection and could easily be mistaken for the community's model home. This distinguished property boasts 5 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, a spacious 2-car garage, an open floor plan, and numerous areas for hosting and entertaining. Upon arrival, guests are greeted by an inviting front porch that leads to a well-lit interior with 9-foot ceilings spanning all three levels and adorned with luxurious flooring and numerous upgrades. The gourmet kitchen is  centrally located and features an expansive island, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a butler's pantry, ample cabinetry, and a generously-sized walk-in pantry. The entertaining spaces seamlessly flow through the first floor, anchored by a magnificent floor-to-ceiling custom fireplace. An office, powder room, and a mudroom off the garage complete this exceptional main level. The upper level has been thoughtfully designed, with a versatile space at the top of the stairs. The primary suite is a sanctuary for relaxation, boasting a sitting area with a fireplace and a spa-like bathroom. Three additional bedrooms, two bathrooms, a laundry room, and ample storage closets round out this level. The finished lower level offers a fifth bedroom with a separate walk-out door, a full bathroom, a spacious utility-storage room, and abundant space for entertainment or play. As an added bonus, the golf simulator/movie theater will remain for the fortunate new residents. This distinctive property also features a sizable Trex deck at the rear, providing picturesque wooded views. Residents can take advantage of amenities such as pool access, the Fitness Barn, the Social Barn, and a plethora of neighborhood events throughout the seasons. Basic high-speed FIOS internet is included. Community amenities include public Jack Nicklaus Golf Course, scenic paths and trails, and the future VRE Station, town center, and more. Welcome home!

PublicRemarks: **Welcome to Broadlands!** Location, location, location! Available for immediate move-in! Rent includes high-speed 1 GBPS Verizon internet. Mill Run, Eagle Ridge, and Briar Woods LCPS pyramid !!!! Presenting a stunning Decatur model built by Van Metre, perfect for entertaining with its expansive 2,928 sq ft. This impressive home features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and is one of the largest townhome models with a 3-level bump-out extension in sought-after Broadlands.  Conveniently located just 2 miles from the Silver Line Metro/Ashburn Station, 7 miles from Dulles International Airport, and with easy access to the Dulles Toll Road (Rt 267) and Rt 28. Close to shops, restaurants, entertainment, and within the highly sought-after Mill Run, Eagle Ridge, and Briar Woods LCPS pyramid. Additionally, it’s near multiple national grocery stores, restaurants, movie theaters, and hospitals. The home has been freshly painted throughout, including the garage, and boasts new carpet on all floors. It has been meticulously power washed, including windows, doors, exterior, and driveway.  The main level boasts formal living and dining rooms, a cozy family room off the kitchen, and a sunroom with a gas fireplace. The upstairs primary suite, one of the largest for townhomes, features walk-in closets and an attached bath with a jetted soaking tub, standing shower with glass surround, and double vanity. There’s enough space for a seating area or office. Two spacious secondary bedrooms with vaulted ceilings share a full hall bathroom, and the laundry room, featuring a washer and dryer , is conveniently located on the bedroom level. Recessed lights in the living area, kitchen, and master bedroom ensure ample lighting throughout, eliminating the need for floor lamps. Enjoy the outdoors with a nice deck and fenced backyard. The lower walk-out level includes new carpet flooring and lighting throughout. It features a spacious recreation room, a legal 4th bedroom, a full bathroom, and a den. Additional highlights include an electric car charger (Tesla, etc.), Nest Thermostat, Nest Doorbell, smart switches in the bedrooms, fans in all bedrooms, $125 for Appliance service fee call. The HOA includes Verizon high-speed internet and access to incredible community amenities such as 3 pools, various tot lots, trails/paths, tennis and sports courts, a fitness center, a nature center, a community center, events, and much more. Requirements :  - Credit score of 700 + - Income at least 2.5 X the rent - No bankruptcy or eviction records Hurry… you don't want to miss this beautiful home!

OwnerName: Vardhman Jain Pukhraj Jain & Jain Ekta
AgentRemarks: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Fair Lakes, this exquisite 2-car garaged townhome is a sanctuary of modern living. With three spacious bedrooms and two full plus two half baths, it offers a harmonious blend of comfort and style. The foyer and living room greet you with the warmth of hardwood floors, while the upper level is a cozy retreat with plush carpeting. The gourmet kitchen is a culinary artist’s dream, leading to a private deck perfect for serene mornings and tranquil evenings. The family room, with its inviting fireplace, promises cozy gatherings and cherished memories. Convenience is at your doorstep with the Fair Lakes Shopping Center just a stone’s throw away. The second and third bedrooms, bathed in natural light and boasting vaulted ceilings, provide a peaceful haven. The upper-level laundry, equipped with a full-sized washer and dryer, adds to the home’s practicality. An attic fan ensures cool comfort during the summer months. For those who work from home, the lower level features a convenient office room, providing a quiet and productive workspace adjacent to a spacious recreational room. Stay ahead of the curve with AI-ready features. Connected devices seamlessly integrate into your lifestyle, from smart refrigerators to fans, reducing energy while maintaining style and comfort. Security and convenience are paramount: a smart door lock provides peace of mind, and garage doors can be controlled remotely. Plus, the oversized garage features storage racks for convenient, organized storage. Recent updates include a new roof in 2019, a water heater in 2020,  both a refrigerator and dishwasher in 2021, new washer replaced in 2023,  ensuring this home is as efficient as it is beautiful.

PublicRemarks: Meticulously maintained and move-in ready, this two-level townhouse/condo features an open floor plan filled with natural light. The kitchen and breakfast area boast hardwood floors that lead to a large balcony, perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation. A main-level office provides a convenient work-from-home space. The expansive living area flows seamlessly into the main dining area, making it ideal for entertaining. The gourmet kitchen includes cherry cabinets, black appliances, and a double wall oven. The master suite offers its own large balcony, a double vanity with granite countertops, and two walk-in closets. Enjoy the luxury of 9-foot ceilings on the main living level. Located just minutes from I-66, Route 50, and Fairfax County Parkway, this home offers easy access to numerous amenities. It's within walking distance to Whole Foods, Kohl's, Fair Oaks Mall, and a variety of restaurants, including Capital Grille. Additional conveniences include nearby movie theaters, grocery stores such as Wegmans, Harris Teeters and Safeway, and a free shuttle to the Vienna Metro. This home combines comfort, style, and a prime location. Recent upgrades: Freshly painted throughout the house (2024), refrigerator (2022), food disposal (2024), sink Faucets (2024), the microwave and exhaust system (2020), master-bed bathroom shower system (2024), toilet seats (2024), daylight bulbs throughout the home (2024) .

PublicRemarks: *This Home is also available for short-term rent. Payment will be adjusted*  Welcome to this exceptional rental opportunity in Arcola Town Center! This brand-new, never-lived-in end-row townhome boasts luxury and convenience. With 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, and one half bath, this home offers ample space for comfortable living. The upper level features 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, including a spacious primary bedroom with a large full bathroom equipped with a stand-up shower and double sinks. The convenience continues with two brand-new washers and dryers on the upper floor. The main floor showcases an elegant open floor plan connecting the dining area, kitchen, and family room, along with a half bathroom and a full deck. The chef-inspired kitchen is equipped with a cooktop, 2 wall ovens, a built-in microwave, a dishwasher, and a stunning island, perfect for culinary endeavors. The first floor houses the 4th bedroom, 3rd full bath, and access to the two-car garage. Situated in the vibrant Arcola Town Center development, this home offers proximity to a brewery, gym, schools, and the Loudoun County Parkway, Dulles Landing, and International Airport IAD, making it an ideal place to call home. Don't miss out on the opportunity to move into this turnkey property! * The Landlord Will purchase a home warranty, the tenant will be responsible for the service call fee, this fee is not reimbursed by the landlord* We do not accept Rentspree applications, please contact us for the link.

AgentRemarks: Schedule online. Instructions for access to property in ShowingTime. See Doc Manager for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option. FAST Application  Processing. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication, and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured.  NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will consider a small dog.  You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card).   If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

Spacious 3 years young Jenkins contemporary design floorplan offers over 2000 finished square feet of living space on 3 levels with desirable Loudoun County address located just outside of Historic Downtown Leesburg where all the conveniences of everyday life coexist with the peaceful Virginia countryside and the vibrant local culture of Leesburg. The ground level foyer entrance offers access to a 4th bedroom or office/den with full bath & walk-in closet.  The light filled open concept main level offers a centrally located kitchen with island that flows broadly into the family room for comfortable everyday living.  The dining area also off the kitchen provides easy access to a nice sized deck for your extended outdoor enjoyment.  The upper level offers 3 bedrooms including an owner's suite with en suite bath and large walk-in closet. PublicRemarks: Discover the epitome of elegance and sophistication in this stunning, nearly-new townhome with a 2-car garage, situated in the award-winning Main Street Residences community in the heart of the City of Fairfax. This glamorous residence boasts large windows on every floor, offering breathtaking wooded views that enhance the charm of every room. Featuring three spacious bedrooms, three luxurious full bathrooms, and two elegant half baths, this home exudes style and comfort. Crown molding and beautifully finished dark hand-stained wooden floors add a touch of grandeur throughout. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, showcasing oversized quartz countertops, soft-close cabinets and drawers, a pull-out trash and recycling cabinet, designer fixtures, upgraded appliances, a double oven, a drawer microwave, and a gas cooktop. Entertain in style with a beautiful built-in bar complete with cabinets, a quartz countertop, and upper glass doors on the main floor. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the living spaces, making it perfect for hosting guests. Ample storage is available throughout, ensuring a clutter-free living experience. The walk-out basement is a haven of luxury, featuring a gas fireplace, built-in floor-to-ceiling wall cabinets, wine storage, and a Eurocave wine refrigerator. Step outside to a charming stone patio or enjoy the Trex decking off the kitchen. As one of the final five units built, the owner collaborated closely with the builder to incorporate numerous special features and upgrades, setting this home apart from the rest. The spacious master bedroom is a sanctuary, offering two customized walk-in closets. The master bathroom is a spa-like retreat, complete with quartz counters, double sinks with vanity, soft-close cabinets and drawers, an enclosed walk-in shower with multiple jets and a built-in bench, and a lovely tub. The top floor offers a very large room with built-in wall cabinetry and a Queen size Murphy Bed, as well as the third bedroom and a full bathroom. This home is conveniently located within walking distance to downtown shops, restaurants, festivals, and farmers markets. Minutes away from I-66, Route 50, and Route 29, it's a commuter’s dream, ideal for employees at the Fairfax Courthouse and only a quick 20-minute drive to Dulles International Airport. This gorgeous, one-of-a-kind home has it all and will not last long. Schedule your private tour today and experience luxury living at its finest! Only 1 pet maximum allowed. Pet must be 20lbs or under.  The basement and all 2nd and third floor furniture will stay with the home. If the tenant would like the main level furniture to stay (couch, dining room table, and dining room cabinet), the rental price will be $4900/month.  The couch, dining room table, and dining room cabinet are all less than a year old and are from Crate and Barrel.

Step outside onto the fenced yard with a deck and screened-in porch to enjoy the peaceful ambiance as the property backs to trees in Parkland. The outdoor shed provides extra storage. Access fun Community amenities include tennis courts, basketball courts, and nature trails for an active lifestyle. The neighborhood is a short distance from school transportation and offers scenic views! Safe parking available in the front entry attached garage with driveway. BONUS: Electricity, Water, Sewer, and Gas Included. This property has professional management, has 24-Hr emergency maintenance, and an online tenant portal. Owner will consider dogs 75lbs or lower on a case by case basis. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application. Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant’s portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this charming, meticulously renovated 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom Condo.  Upon entry, the foyer leads to a bright living space with 8-foot ceilings, recessed lighting, and two hall closets. The dining area and eat-in kitchen boast upgraded appliances including a dishwasher, convection microwave, counter-depth refrigerator, and slide-in gas stove. The kitchen features crown moldings, porcelain flooring, white granite countertops, custom maple wood cabinetry with soft-closing doors and drawers, and a redesigned pantry with pull drawers. The adjoining utility room houses a recently replaced Carrier furnace and AO Smith gas hot water heater (replaced 12/2020). The dining area flows into a living room with an electric fireplace and a private covered patio, ideal for relaxation. The primary suite offers ample space, two closets, and a renovated ensuite bath with Crema Marfil marble, an enlarged custom glass shower, soaking tub, upgraded vanity, Schonbeck crystal sconces, recessed lighting with dimmers, and wall recesses for toiletries. The second bedroom is bright with natural light, a full closet, and an adjoining fully renovated bathroom. The guest bathroom, also featuring Crema Marfil marble, includes an upgraded vanity, brushed nickel faucets, sconces, and a deep soaking tub. This home combines elegance and convenience, perfect for comfortable living and entertaining. This unit offers accessibility, an assigned parking space, ample guest parking, community pool access, and a picturesque, tree-lined neighborhood with a spacious open floor plan. This units location is prime  with everything within reach,  just a short drive to Fairfax Towne Center, Fairfax Corner, and Penderbrook Country Club.  Walking distant to Whole Foods grocery and close distance to Fair Oaks Mall.  Easy access to north/south Fairfax County Parkway, route 66 and within easy commuting distance to Washington D.C., Union Station (Amtrak) and Ronald Reagan and Dulles International Airports The community is proximate to multiple trails, parks nearby lakes and ponds.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this stunning former model home, nestled in the prestigious Stoney Creek Estates neighborhood and highly rated Winston Churchill school district. Boasting 6 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, and situated on just over two acres, this residence epitomizes elegance and comfort. The property features a brand-new roof installed in 2024, a rare find indeed, along with the convenience of public water and sewer services. Spanning over 8,000 square feet, this residence offers a grandeur living experience with spacious rooms, soaring ceilings, and exquisite crown molding throughout. Upon entry through the covered portico, guests are greeted by a majestic 2-story foyer, adorned with a dramatic staircase and a designer powder room. The heart of the home lies in the gourmet island kitchen, adorned with granite countertops, cherry-wood cabinets, a convenient butler’s pantry, and a charming breakfast room. A private office, complete with custom built-in library bookcases, and formal living and dining rooms, featuring crown molding and chair rail detailing, add to the home's allure. The luxurious owner’s suite offers a tranquil sitting  area overlooking the swimming pool, a tray ceiling, walk-in closets, and a spa-style bathroom. Upstairs, discover 4 additional bedrooms and 3 baths, ensuring ample space for family and guests. The basement is an entertainer’s delight, featuring a game room, bar, and an in-law suite. Outside, revel in the best of suburban living with lush greenery and easy access to multiple shopping centers. Whether for multi-generational living or those seeking abundant space, this home is an ideal sanctuary. Completing this exceptional property is a three-car garage, providing ample parking and storage. Don't miss the opportunity to make this extraordinary residence your own!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your new home!  This charming 3-level estate home is tucked away in the highly sought after and upscale neighborhood of Cedar Crest. Perfectly situated - with a back to the woods on over 3 acres of privacy. Inside your dream home, there is a room for every activity - from entertainment to relaxation. With 7 bedrooms, 7.5 bathrooms and a side-entry 3 car garage, there is ample room for any size family to reside and thrive.  The main level features a gorgeous sunroom, a cozy sitting room conveniently located beside a gourmet kitchen, a spacious home office space (that easily converts to a bedroom) and a properly designed laundry room with plenty of cabinet & counter space.  The upper level boasts a total of 6 bedrooms and 5 full bathrooms, with additional laundry space to be found inside an elegant primary bedroom. Once you’ve set foot in the walk-in closet or into the lounge of the master bedroom, you will find yourself in a haven within your home - a place of respite and relaxation.  When entertainment is on your itinerary, the lower level holds ample space for recreation! With a built-in bar and an additional bedroom-bathroom combo for any guests that decide to stay the night.  Established at 8,519 finished sq. ft, this charming, yet private home is part of an excellent neighborhood with notable surrounding schools that include:  Buffalo Trail Elementary, Willard Middle School, & Lightridge High School. Privacy, luxury, and space come together in harmony at this location, showing you what is possible to call “home”.  Move-in ready and ideally situated to enjoy the best that Loudoun County has to offer - Near Bull Run Stables, South Riding Golf Club, Pleasant Valley Golf Club, Chantilly National Golf & Country Club, and The Winery at Bull Run. Convenient access to Rt 50, Rt 66, and Dulles Airport (IAD). Minutes from the heart of Chantilly, Wegmans, Costco, Walmart, Dulles Expo Center, Target, medical facilities, restaurants and much more! Don’t miss the incredible opportunity to make this immaculate estate home your home today!

PublicRemarks: Here it is! A very rare opportunity indeed! Looking for a home with a pool and in a great location-close to everything?  Yes, this one has a pool, and a hot tub, and much more! Located just 4 minutes from I-95, and only 1 minute away from Commuter Parking Lot 610, and within walking distance to shopping, dining, schools, entertainment and so many other conveniences! This beautifully updated large home (over 3000 square feet of finished space on all three levels) has a wonderful kitchen and beautiful bathrooms that make you feel like you are in a luxury resort. Located close to everything, yet tucked away in a quiet little neighborhood, this beauty offers so much! Great curb appeal, two car garage, with extra parking to the side of the driveway. The main floor has an inviting foyer with upgraded flooring. A formal living room or perfect study leads to the formal dining area that can used for many other purposes. The well-appointed kitchen with newer appliances and a large island is perfect for cooking and entertaining.  A large eat in area adjacent to the kitchen overlooks the backyard and pool make a perfect place to enjoy the wonderful meal that was just prepared. A very large family room with cozy gas fireplace combines with the kitchen and dining area for a perfect flow. The laundry room has front loading washer and dryer and ample cabinetry for extra storage. The powder room is conveniently located right off the entry and close to the laundry and garage entry. The upstairs has four large bedrooms. The primary bedroom and bath suite have been completely updated with contemporary features and beautiful upgrades. The second, third and fourth bedroom each have large closets and views of the backyard and pool. The second full bathroom is also updated with contemporary features and the hallway is complete with two large linen and storage closets.   Downstairs you will find even more space to live, play in and enjoy. There is a large recreation room and a huge workout/study/crafts area. There is also a very large room that could be used as a guest room area (does not qualify as an actual bedroom). The basement also has a third completely updated full bath and has a walk-up access to the backyard and pool area.  Imagine living life and enjoying entertaining friends with this lovely pool and hot tub in your private backyard! Included in the rent is the pool and hot tub maintenance.

Welcome to this charming Colonial home located at 12460 Boxwood Farms Dr. in Catharpin, VA. As you step inside, you are greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere that is sure to make you feel right at home. This 4 bedroom, 3 bath property boasts a wood burning stove, perfect for cozying up on those chilly evenings. The built-in bookshelves add character and charm to the living space, while the granite countertops in the kitchen provide a touch of luxury. Situated on 5 acres of land, this home offers plenty of space for outdoor activities and relaxation. The fenced-in backyard is ideal for pets or children to play safely while you enjoy the peaceful surroundings. The open floor plan of this home allows for easy flow between the living, dining, and kitchen areas, making it perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying family time. The natural light that floods the rooms creates a bright and airy ambiance that is both welcoming and refreshing. Whether you're looking to unwind by the wood burning stove, curl up with a good book in the built-in bookshelves, or prepare a delicious meal in the gourmet kitchen with granite countertops, this home has something for everyone. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this beautiful property your own. Schedule a showing today and experience the sensory-rich appeal of this Colonial home in Catharpin, VA.

PublicRemarks: Langley House, established in 1719 by Thomas Lee, renowned for Stratford Hall, honors his ancestral estate in England. This 10,000 square-foot estate, set on over an acre in the exclusive Langley Forest neighborhood, blends 18th-century grandeur with 21st-century style. The elegant interior features a stately entrance hall, a magnificent dining room, a refined living room with a wood-burning fireplace, a bright family room, and a gourmet chef's kitchen with a butler's pantry. The main level also includes a paneled study, a sunlit conservatory, a secondary office, and two powder rooms. The upper level boasts a luxurious owner's suite with a sitting room, two walk-in closets, and an opulent bath, along with four additional bedrooms, each with its own full bathroom. The lower level features a recreation room with a stone fireplace, a fully equipped bar, a sixth bedroom with a full bathroom, and a large unfinished area for future projects. The exterior matches the interior's high quality, with a spacious backyard, a stone patio, and room for a pool or other enhancements. Two parking courts and a three-car garage complete the amenities. Located less than 2 miles from McLean and under 8 miles from Washington, DC, Langley House is a distinguished offering in contemporary McLean, Virginia.

AgentRemarks: $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Nestled on a fenced corner lot. The main level boasts a formal living room, dining room, and a family room that opens to the kitchen. The light-filled eat-in kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring a beautiful tile backsplash, gas cooktop, wall oven, and a pantry for extra storage. Upstairs, you'll find the spacious primary bedroom with an ensuite bath. Relax in the ensuite soaking tub or use the separate shower for a quick refresh. The dual sink vanity offers ample space for morning routines. Three additional bedrooms and a full bath with a dual vanity complete the upper level. The lower level is finished with carpeting, creating an ideal space for relaxing. The back deck, partially screened, allows you to enjoy the outdoors even in less-than-perfect weather. This home is part of the Hampton Oaks community, which includes sidewalks, walking paths, a community center, and an outdoor pool. Shopping and commuter lots are just minutes away, and easy access to I-95 and Rt 1 makes commuting convenient.

You can cozy up in the spacious living room with a gas fireplace. Towards the back of the home, you will find a large mudroom. Off the mudroom, the garage door opens to a spacious, high-ceiling, two-car garage. The gorgeous master suite includes two walk-in closets and a bright and airy owner's bathroom. The basement features a large recreational space, a hobby room, a full bathroom, and additional storage. Owners prefer tenants who want the utilities/services package so that everything remains in owners' name. Rare rental opportunity in sought-after Falcon Ridge!  Gorgeous brick French country-style colonial on 1.75 bucolic acres yet only minutes from Great Falls Village and all major commuting routes.  Lounge by the pool or relax on the terrace while enjoying the beautiful landscaping.  Stay active with close proximity to the Potomac River and trails.  The lovely interior of the home matches its exquisite outdoors, with spacious areas for work, play and entertaining: large library, gourmet chef's kitchen, open family room, primary bedroom with private balcony, finished walkout lower level...this home truly has it all!  $8500 is the furnished base lease price or $11000 per month which includes all utilities, TV and internet, annual pool opening and closing, weekly pool service cleaning and necessary chemicals (April through September), regular yard service (weekly mowing in season, two clean ups a year, and snow removal), quarterly water service (checking well system and filling salt reservoir), semi-annual HVAC service (maintaining ducts and changing filters), quarterly pest service, and annual HOA fees (covering trash service).  Come see all the wonderful things that Falcon Ridge and Great Falls has to offer!

The lovely interior of the home matches its exquisite outdoors, with spacious areas for work, play and entertaining: large library, gourmet chef's kitchen, open family room, primary bedroom with private balcony, finished walkout lower level...this home truly has it all!  $8500 is the furnished base lease price or $11000 per month which includes all utilities, TV and internet, annual pool opening and closing, weekly pool service cleaning and necessary chemicals (April through September), regular yard service (weekly mowing in season, two clean ups a year, and snow removal), quarterly water service (checking well system and filling salt reservoir), semi-annual HVAC service (maintaining ducts and changing filters), quarterly pest service, and annual HOA fees (covering trash service).  Come see all the wonderful things that Falcon Ridge and Great Falls has to offer!

AgentRemarks: Owner offering discounted 24-month lease term at $2800 $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Nestled just yards from the serene waters of Belmont Bay and the Occoquan River, this prime condo offers a perfect blend of waterfront living and modern convenience. Surrounded by scenic walking trails and adjacent to the peaceful Occoquan Bay National Wildlife Refuge, this location is a nature lover's dream. With the Belmont Bay Marina just two blocks away, you can easily join the boat club, reserve a boat, and set sail whenever the mood strikes. The community amenities are plentiful, including pools, tennis courts, walking paths, a kayak club, and direct waterfront access within 50 feet of your front door. This condo features two spacious bedrooms and two full baths on opposite sides of the home, with the primary bedroom boasting a walk-in closet. The sunroom/office, framed by large windows, offers a peaceful view of an inviting patio, perfect for entertaining. The updated kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, Corian countertops, and white cabinetry, complemented by additional interior features such as a washer and dryer, dishwasher, air conditioning, a Nest thermostat, and beautiful hardwood floors. You’ll enjoy the convenience of an underground parking space, access to bike racks, and the security of a building with controlled access. The building amenities also include a workout gym, and the surrounding community offers tennis courts, a pool, and easy access to various nearby attractions. Conveniently located within walking distance to restaurants, a hair salon, a nail salon, and a yoga studio, as well as the Woodbridge VRE commuter station, this condo provides easy access to I-95, bus service to the Pentagon and D.C., and a short commute to Fort Belvoir and Quantico. Additionally, enjoy nearby shopping and dining at Stonebridge, the Town of Occoquan, and Potomac Mills.

AgentRemarks: Located in the Mount Vernon area of Alexandria, VA, 8626 Beekman Pl #26C is situated in a charming and well-established residential community. The area is known for its historical significance, beautiful landscapes, and proximity to the Potomac River. Parks and Recreation: The neighborhood is close to several parks, including the scenic Huntley Meadows Park, which offers walking trails, bird watching, and natural wetlands. The Mount Vernon Trail along the Potomac River provides opportunities for biking, jogging, and picnicking.  There are numerous shopping centers and dining options nearby, including the Mount Vernon  Renovated All bathrooms, New carpet, Fresh paintPlaza and Belle View Shopping Center. These centers offer a variety of retail stores, grocery options, and restaurants.  Public Transit: The neighborhood is well-connected by public transportation. Several bus routes serve the area, providing easy access to nearby metro stations like Huntington Station on the Yellow Line, which connects to Washington, D.C. and other parts of Northern Virginia. Road Access: Beekman Place is conveniently located near Richmond Highway (U.S. Route 1), which offers a direct route to downtown Alexandria, Old Town, and Washington, D.C. The George Washington Memorial Parkway is also nearby, providing a scenic drive along the Potomac River.  Historical Sites: The area is rich in history, with landmarks such as George Washington's Mount Vernon Estate and Gardens located nearby. These sites offer educational opportunities and attract visitors from all over.

PublicRemarks: Prepare to be WOWed! This stunning 2 bedroom/2.5 bathroom condo with soaring 12 foot ceilings (unique to this floor) and open concept living is a rare find! Perfectly positioned for the most desirable sunlight and best view of the courtyard. This 4 year young luxury building with modern conveniences is in a prime location. As you enter the foyer, wide-planked flooring flows throughout the entire home. The full size laundry room to the left can serve as a mudroom and provides extra storage. The powder room to the right is great for guests. The inviting kitchen sparkles with state of the art Wi-Fi enabled LG appliances. The Quartz waterfall island with a stainless steel farmhouse sink is the perfect gathering spot. As you move into the living room, the rarely available wall of windows is breathtaking. This allows for tremendous natural light but also adorned with custom blinds for privacy. There’s also a perfect dining space over looking the courtyard. The primary suite is spacious and bright. The spa bath features dual vanities, frameless glass shower and huge walk-in closet. The 2nd bedroom does not disappoint. It’s equally as spacious with its own bathroom and huge walk-in closet. This main level unit has its own private patio that leads directly to the tranquil courtyard. It’s the perfect spot to enjoy morning coffee or evening wine. It doesn’t get any more peaceful than this unit’s location. Other highlights about the community: 2 reserved underground parking spaces (side by side and close to the elevator), large separate storage unit, concierge and secured entry, amazon hub for deliveries, bike room, clubroom, fitness center, less than a 10 minute walk to the McLean metro , Capital One Center and Wegmans yet surrounded by tree-lined sidewalks. AgentRemarks: Text listing agent for transaction info. Schedule online. Instructions for access to property in ShowingTime. See Doc Manager for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident  $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication, and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured.  NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Sorry no pets.  You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card).   If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

AgentRemarks: Gorgeous 3BR well maintained & updated throughout! Situated away from the hustle and bustle next to parkland in one of Arlington's most sought-after communities - Wingate of Arlington.  Main level features spacious Living Room & Dining Room with hardwood flooring, Powder Room, Kitchen with plentiful cabinetry, granite counters, tiled floors adjacent to Breakfast Room with woodburning FP and doors to deck.  You will find two nicely sized Bedrooms with remodeled ensuite Bathrooms on the upper level.  The Finished lower level features a Family Room, 3rd legal Bedroom, Full Bath and Laundry area.  Updated energy efficient windows throughout.  Rent includes: Community Pool and Tennis, front yard care, trash, water & snow removal as well as one reserved parking spot with other parking available in non-reserved spaces.  What a location! Barcroft Park is right out your front door, walk to Shirlington, W&OD trail and more!  Commuters delight with easy commute to DC, Pentagon, Crystal City, Alexandria, or Arlington via I395, Glebe Rd, or King St.  Owner prefers 24 month minimum lease term. Available for lease beginning August 29th.  Please be sure to review rental guidelines and application in documents tab prior to showing.
PublicRemarks: Gorgeous 3BR well maintained & updated throughout! Situated away from the hustle and bustle next to parkland in one of Arlington's most sought-after communities - Wingate of Arlington.  Main level features spacious Living Room & Dining Room with hardwood flooring, Powder Room, Kitchen with plentiful cabinetry, granite counters, tiled floors adjacent to Breakfast Room with woodburning FP and doors to deck.  You will find two nicely sized Bedrooms with remodeled ensuite Bathrooms on the upper level.  The Finished lower level features a Family Room, 3rd legal Bedroom, Full Bath and Laundry area.  Updated energy efficient windows throughout.  Rent includes: Community Pool and Tennis, front yard care, trash, water & snow removal as well as one reserved parking spot with other parking available in non-reserved spaces.  What a location! Barcroft Park is right out your front door, walk to Shirlington, W&OD trail and more!  Commuters delight with easy commute to DC, Pentagon, Crystal City, Alexandria, or Arlington via I395, Glebe Rd, or King St.  Owner prefers 24 month minimum lease term. Available for lease beginning August 29th.

ListOfficeName: Bay Property Mgmt Group Northern Virginia, LLC.
AgentRemarks: Please contact Joshua with Bay Property Management Group at  jsexton@bmgnva.com or call 804-502-2368 with any questions you have about the property. Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable Owner will consider pet(s) on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

Excellent Location !! next to the Inova Fairfax Hospital with easy access from the condo community, minutes to Dunn Loring Metro, Wegmans, GMU, NVCC, 495. This one has it all. ******

The main level boasts built-in bookcases and a large private deck, perfect for entertaining. The luxurious master bedroom includes a Jacuzzi tub for ultimate relaxation. The walk-out basement offers additional living space and direct access to the fenced yard, ideal for outdoor activities. Located in a prime spot, you can easily walk to Tysons Corner Mall and the Metro, enjoying all the shopping, dining, and commuting conveniences this vibrant area has to offer. Despite its central location, the home remains peaceful and quiet, with ample guest parking available. Dogs 20lbs and under are allowed. No cats or exoctic animals.

AgentRemarks: Also available on a Lease/Purchase Option. See For Sale Listing. Brand Spanking New - and Ready for You!!!! Two kitchens, two laundry rooms and a 3-car garage, close to everything, yet private and serene! This is an amazing opportunity to enjoy a brand-new home that has never been lived in! This stunning 6-bedroom, 5-bath home with a 3-car garage is completely finished on three levels and is situated on a private .43-acre lot, surrounded by 2 acres of beautiful trees and open space. Located in one of the most desirable areas in Falls Church, this colonial/open floor concept brick home overlooks the Malbrook subdivision leading into Lake Barcroft. The main level features a welcoming foyer that leads into an expansive living room/family room with a cozy fireplace. The spacious dining room is conveniently located on the other side of the foyer. The open and inviting gourmet kitchen provides ample room to entertain, cook, relax, and enjoy time with family, friends, and guests. This kitchen is complete with a center counter range, upgraded countertops, stainless steel upgraded appliances, and much more! The garage also has a convenient entrance directly to the kitchen for easy unloading of groceries, and other household necessities.  The bright sunroom off the kitchen allows natural light and exterior views to pour in, with glass doors leading to an outside flagstone terrace. Additionally, the main level bathroom is easily accessible from all rooms on the main level, ensuring convenience and comfort. As you enter the upper you will find 4 bedrooms and central laundry room/ storage space. Master bedroom features an extra-large walk-in closet with two windows. Master bath has jacuzzi tub plus walk in shower and two sink lavatories. Large windows throughout the entire house provide plenty of natural light and offer exquisite views of the seasons. The Master Bedroom also leads up to 4th floor two room hide-away for private space and tree top views. The Front main level entrance also has lower-level entrance leading into large recreation room with wet bar, dishwasher and two bedrooms plus utility room with another washer and dryer in rear. The three-car side loading garage also has separate entry down into lower level through utility room, thus eliminating an unattractive and sometimes messy mud room on main level.  This lower level has two entrances, in the front and the back of the home, making it a very attractive and private oasis for guests,  As a bonus this property still has old 1800’s stone lined well with pump for irrigation. Pets on case-by-case basis. Also available on a Lease/Purchase Option.

Sorry No Pets.  $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication, and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured.  NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will consider one dog under 50 pounds.  If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Move in September 1st,  a beautifully maintained, spacious FOUR-bedroom, three and a half bathroom townhouse in a highly sought-after location in Leesburg. This freshly updated home offers a luxurious yet comfortable lifestyle. This bright and airy three-story townhome is flooded with natural light, complimenting its neutral color palette and top-of-the-line finishes. The main level greets you with an open-concept living space, characterized by hardwood floors and a seamless flow from the living room into the dining area. At the heart of this home is the kitchen, beautifully finished with ceramic tile floors, updated granite countertops, and recessed lighting. A stylish, modern pendant light graces the countertop area and the dining table, adding a touch of elegance to the space. The kitchen also includes a functional pantry for all your storage needs. Further enhancing the home's appeal is the rear dining area which opens to an oversized deck (22x16) freshly painted and refreshed. This outdoor space, accessible via stairs from the lower level, creates the perfect setting for alfresco dining and outdoor entertaining. Upstairs, all 3 bedrooms boast with cathedral ceilings and laminate floors. The primary bedroom offers a walk in closet, ample windows, an elegant ensuite with dual vanities, separate shower and a soaking tub, creating a perfect sanctuary after a long day. The remaining two bedrooms are generously sized, with plenty of storage space. A second full bathroom and a laundry room complete the upstairs, providing convenience at your fingertips. The lower level presents an expansive fourth bedroom, perfect for guests or an in-home office. It also boasts a welcoming rec room, where you can delight in movie marathons or thrilling game nights. A third full bathroom featuring a convenient shower-tub combination serves this floor. Additionally, this level provides direct access to the lower deck, expanding your living space to the outdoors. NO PETS.  This property includes a two-car garage and driveway to park 4 mid size cars. PublicRemarks: Welcome to 1422 Aldenham Lane, in the sought after neighborhood of The Uplands in Reston's Lake Anne area! You will so enjoy the open flow of this home. The spacious foyer area expands to the Living Room and keeps on going to a distinct Dining Area with Sliding Glass Door to your own bit of a nature's haven. Convenient to the dining space is a WOW kitchen. The Modern Design features lots of tall Maple Cabinets and Drawers, Quartz Counters and recessed lighting! Upgraded Stainless Steel appliances including gas cooking! From the Kitchen you can retreat to the cozy Family Room with fireplace. There is a remodeled Powder Room off the front hallway. And, you can't miss Grand Central off the kitchen...the Cubby/Laundry/Shortcut space that leads to the carport!  Upper level features Primary Suite with ample space for bed and furniture, THREE closets and even a sitting room with Juliet style balcony.  The Upper level also offers three additional bedrooms, large hall closet and remodeled hall bath.  All 4 bedrooms and UL hallway freshly painted in neutral color. Lower level features a large rec room, plenty of storage and a utility area. Paneling in storage area freshly painted. Newer large Anderson windows, roof and gutters. Gorgeous hardwood floors on two levels. Soft decorator colors throughout! You will so enjoy the huge Stone Patio in a beautifully landscaped backyard. The carport offers additional storage spaces. What a fabulous location! Less than 2 miles to Wiehle Metro Station. The Uplands pool, playground and tennis courts are in close proximity. Neighborhood schools feature AAP Center and Spanish Immersion. Follow the wooded paths to Lake Anne Farmers Market on Saturday mornings. Great home and location! PLEASE read: prefer 22 month lease; will consider 1 dog; NO cats; minimum qualifying income is $184,500 (use max of 2 incomes).  Available August 30!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Bright & Beautiful Brick Home- Walk to Downton Falls Church! This spacious and sun-filled home features hardwood floors, an opened kitchen/dining, and high-end finishes throughout. The main floor welcomes you and your guests into a large living room with a fireplace and picture window with views of the tree lined, quiet end street. An expanded doorway leads to the kitchen with modern cabinets with additional storage, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, and breakfast bar. The adjacent dining area opens to the party-sized wood deck which include steps down to the fully fenced back yard. Back inside, two generously sized guest bedrooms and a full bath in the hall complete the main floor. Upstairs, you'll find a primary suite extending the length of the home. You'll love the luxurious en-suite bath, ample closet space, and bonus dressing/sitting area. The lower level boasts a bright rec-room with recessed lighting and built-ins, another bedroom, and a large laundry/storage room with walk-up steps to the back yard. Ideally situated on a large, flat, fully-fenced lot with a huge 2-car storage garage- ideal for a home gym, workshop, or covered outdoor entertainment area. Great location with minimal thru-traffic on a tree lined street that ends at a woodsy park and playground. Walk to downtown Falls Church's shops, restaurants, grocery stores (Whole Foods and Harris Teeter), and parks and just a short ride to Mosaic District, Tyson's Corner, Arlington, and major commuter routes. Walkable in 8 minutes via shaded pedestrian path to La Tingeria, Italian Cafe, Wild Tacoz, Happy Tart and more; within 15-20 minute walk reach Claire and Don's, NorthSide Social; Thompson Italian; Audacious Brewery, Solace Brewery Outpost, Dominion Wine and Beer, Nue, Ellie Bird, Preservation Biscuit, BakeShop; multiple Sushi and Thai options and more!

AgentRemarks: Expanded, updated and lovingly maintained home in desirable River Crest/Bellevue Forest. The 20,500 Square Foot Lot is an oasis of mature plantings, flowering trees and plants that is truly a must see. This majestic home sits on a "Crest" on 38th Street overlooking the neighborhood and surrounding area. An extensive addition was added in 2001 creating a grand Primary Suite and Spa Bath, as well as an expanded gourmet kitchen with table space and walls of windows overlooking the deck, patio, water feature and plantings. Both a family room and sun room were also part of this expansion. Freshly painted and refinished floors throughout. Some of the more recent upgrades include - 2015 main level bath renovation to include a main floor washer and dryer - 2018 2 stage furnace and water heater - 2022 humidifier. Home Energy Medics audited and completely updated entire home to include ducts, insulation, crawl spaces creating a truly energy efficient home. In addition, a germicidal air purifier was added. Bonus room on lower level has been used by the owners as a 5th bedroom. Steps to Potomac River Trail, Gulf Branch Nature Center and more trails, parks, bike trails as well as Potomac Overlook. One light to DC and easy access to Clarendon, Tysons all of the DC Metro area. LAWN CARE IS INCLUDED IN LEASE TERMS.

PublicRemarks: An exceptional opportunity is available to lease an end-unit 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom townhome in Ashburn. The property features a fully finished interior across all three levels, presenting a spacious living area of nearly 4000 sq. ft. Its prime location provides convenient access to various amenities. At the same time, the premium lot offers scenic tree-lined views. The main living level boasts pristine hardwood flooring, complemented by carpeted bedrooms and a basement area. The finished lower level encompasses a versatile space and a complete bathroom. Additionally, the residence is equipped with upgraded appliances throughout, and the centrally positioned kitchen is designed within an open floor plan. The property also enjoys easy access to Park & Ride, Silver Line transportation, and local bus services, with proximity to esteemed schools. Homeowners' association amenities include access to pools, clubhouses, and fitness facilities. Furthermore, the property is equipped with Verizon FiOS connectivity and a built-in security system, ensuring low-maintenance living.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this stunning 2-bedroom Plus study, 2-bathroom condo located in the prestigious MOSAIC AT WOODLAND PARK community. This modern home boasts a stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances, elegant marble countertops, and luxury flooring throughout the open floor plan. Natural light floods the space, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The Primary Suite features a spacious walk-in closet and a private bathroom, with additional storage available. Step onto your own private balcony and enjoy views of the nearby park while sipping your morning coffee or relaxing in the evening. Convenience is key with an assigned parking spot in the garage and ample road parking for guests. Community amenities include barbecue stations for outdoor gatherings. Just 0.7 miles from the Herndon-Monroe metro station, commuting to Washington, D.C. is a breeze. Nearby grocery stores, dining options, and retail at Reston Town Center are within easy reach. Close proximity to major routes such as Route 28, the 267 toll road, and Fairfax County Parkway ensures easy access for your daily commute. This condo offers not just a home, but a lifestyle of convenience, luxury, and connectivity. Tenant is responsible for service call repair fees up to $100; landlord covers costs exceeding this amount. Don't miss out on the opportunity to live in one of the most desirable communities in the area!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  ****LIST ANY ADDITIONAL SIZE/WEIGHT/BREED RESTRICTIONS DEPENDING ON LANDLORD OR ASSOCIATION RULES**** There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Stately English Manor home built by Botero in Springvale area of Great Falls.  2 acres that offer you privacy with this landscaped lot.  Fantastic for entertaining both inside and outside.  Lots of spacious rooms with views of the backyard, swimming pool and green space. Enter into the home and be wowed by the open grand entrance that provides a view to the entire home.  On the main level you will find the living area, a conservatory/studio, formal dining room, office with a fireplace and built-in bookcases, a family room that leads into the large kitchen, breakfast area and has access to the backyard.  There is a butler panty and  wine cellar on this level as well.  Additionally, there is a bedroom and full bath, and  a laundry room. The curved staircase leads to the upper level and overlooks the foyer.  On the upper level you will find the grand primary suite complete with sitting area, 2-sided fireplace, bedroom area with built-ins, 4 large walk in closets, a deluxe bathroom and separate exercise area.  There are an additional 4 bedrooms on the upper level each with it's own private bathroom.  There is a second level laundry room on the upper level. On the lower level which has many large windows letting in natural light you will find a theater room with plenty for seating, a TV/media room, a large wine cellar, a separate bedroom with attached full bathroom and a yoga room/meditation room overlooking the cascading exterior water wall. The backyard boats a wonderful in-ground pool, an entertainment/cooking area, there is a gazebo and large flat green lawn as well.

PublicRemarks: Incredible WOW Property - Seize the opportunity to call this your home for a year or two!  Stunning and meticulously kept 5 bedroom, 4 1/2 bathroom beauty on a .66 acre fenced and level lot!  Enjoy an open floor plan with high ceilings, large rooms and a great flow throughout!  The main level has hardwood floors throughout and boasts one of the nicest gourmet kitchens you will come across.  Located just off the kitchen is a huge family room with coffered ceilings and gorgeous floor to ceiling fireplace!  Enjoy the main level office, formal living and dining areas, laundry/mud room and large pantry.   The bedroom level boasts a luxury owner's suite with sitting room and bathroom with glass enclosed shower and separate jetted tub, spacious bedrooms 2 and 3 with Jack-n-Jill bathroom, 4th en-suite bedroom and ELFA closet systems throughout.  A finished lower rec-room, 5th bedroom, full bath, gigantic storage area and walkup exit complete the lower level of this magnificent home.  The outside is every bit as impressive - enjoy your 3-car, side load garage, huge deck and porch with retractable screen , flat screen TV and grill area overlooking the rear yard!  Conveniently located 15 minutes from IAD, just a few miles to 267/Dulles Greenway, Route 7, and Route 15, the newly developed Compass Creek Shopping Center and the Leesburg Outlets.  Also enjoy some of Loudoun Counties amenities including several of Virginia's finest breweries and vineyards just a short distance away.  This property  is walking distance from Sycolin Creek Elementary School and steps away from Loudoun Country Day School, one of the premier PK-8 private, independent schools in Loudoun County.

PublicRemarks: Beautiful 1240SF 2-bed 2-bath high-rise condo in the highly sought-after Place One community available for rent. Hardwood floors throughout with an upgraded kitchen and two full showers. This unit also features high-end appliances (in-unit washer and dryer), an oversized balcony with an amazing view. Resort-style amenities are on site (including 24/7 front desk, secure entrance, gym, sauna, pool/BBQ area, party room, 2 tennis courts, walking trail, dog park, social events, and more). Rent includes all utilities (except for cable/Internet) and 1 garage parking. Extra storage is provided by the building when available. It’s a commuter’s dream offering both convenience and luxury. Located 2 miles from Van Dorn Street metro, the building is on 4 bus lines and short commute to Old Town Alexandria, Reagan National Airport, Pentagon, Crystal City, Amazon HQ2, Arlington, and Tysons. Background check and application are required ($60 per adult, non-refundable). 1-month rent as security deposit and 1-month rent at front plus additional $50 pet rent if approved.

The main level offers a spacious family room with a gas fireplace that leads to a private deck, a lovely sunroom, a dedicated office room, a formal dining room and a gourmet kitchen with breakfast area and an oversized two-story window. This main level has newly finished hardwood floors and porcelain tile flooring. The kitchen, office and dining rooms boast magnificent bay windows. The upper-level features four generously sized bedrooms all with hardwood floors and three bathrooms. The large owner’s suite has two walk-in closets, and a master bathroom with dual vanities, a jacuzzi tub and a separate shower. PublicRemarks: Elegance awaits in this stunning 5-bedroom, 5.5-bathroom colonial estate in the prestigious Lansdowne on the Potomac community. Spread over 5,800 square feet, this expansive home is perfect for families who love to entertain. Imagine grand gatherings in the two-story foyer that seamlessly flows into a welcoming family room warmed by a cozy fireplace. The gourmet kitchen, boasting granite countertops and top-of-the-line appliances, will inspire your inner chef, while the adjoining breakfast area provides a casual space for everyday meals. Host unforgettable dinners in the formal dining room, perfect for special occasions and family celebrations. Retire to one of the five spacious bedrooms, including a luxurious master suite with a private bathroom for ultimate relaxation. Need extra living space? The finished basement offers endless possibilities, be it a home theater, a game room, or a comfortable in-law suite. This prime location in Lansdowne on the Potomac places you at the heart of a convenient and vibrant community. You'll find a variety of shops, restaurants, and cafes to explore just a short drive away, perfect for grabbing groceries, enjoying a night out, or exploring local favorites. Major commuter routes are close by, making getting around for work or weekend adventures a breeze. Nature enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to parks and the Potomac River, offering opportunities for outdoor recreation.
